sentence_eng_Latn: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

sentence_eng_Latn: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

sentence_swh_Latn: Katika wingi wa kura, asilimia 29 ya wale waliofanyiwa utafiti wanaamini Australia inapaswa kuwa jamhuri haraka iwezekanavyo, huku asilimia 31 wakiamini Australia haipaswi kamwe kuwa jamhuri.

sentence_eng_Latn: The Olympic gold medalist was due to swim in the 100m and 200m freestyle and in three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaints his fitness has been in doubt.
sentence_swh_Latn: Aliyeshinda nishani ya dhahabu ya Olimpiki alikuwa amepangiwa kuogelea katika mtindo huru wa mita 100 na mita 200 na mbio tatu za kupokezana vijiti katika Michezo ya Jumuiya ya Madola, lakini kwa sababu ya malalamiko yake uzima wake umekuwa na shaka.

sentence_eng_Latn: He has been unable to take the drugs needed to overcome his pain as they are banned from the Games.
sentence_swh_Latn: Hakuweza kunywa dawa zinazohitajika kutuliza maumivu yake kwani zimepigwa marufuku katika Michezo.

sentence_eng_Latn: Curtis Cooper, a mathematician and computer science professor at the University of Central Missouri, has discovered the largest known prime number to date on January 25.
sentence_swh_Latn: Curtis Cooper, mtaalamu wa hisabati na profesa wa sayansi ya kompyuta katika Chuo Kikuu cha Missouri, amegundua nambari tasa kubwa zaidi kufikia sasa mnamo Januari 25.

sentence_eng_Latn: Several people verified the discovery using different hardware and software by the beginning of February and it was announced on Tuesday.
sentence_swh_Latn: Watu kadhaa walithibitisha uvumbuzi huo kutumia maunzi na programu tofauti kufikia mwanzoni mwa Februari na ikatangazwa mnamo Jumanne.

sentence_eng_Latn: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kuna uwezekano kwamba nyotamkia zilikuwa chanzo cha kusafirisha maji katika dunia, pamoja na vitu vilivyo na kaboni vinavyoweza kuunda protini na kusaidia uhai.

sentence_eng_Latn: Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, since comets collided with the Earth long ago.
sentence_swh_Latn: Wanasayansi wanatumai kuelewa jinsi sayari huundwa, hasa jinsi Dunia ilivyoundwa, kwani nyotamkia ziligongana na Dunia kitambo.

sentence_eng_Latn: Cuomo, 53, began his governorship earlier this year and signed a bill last month legalizing same-sex marriage.
sentence_swh_Latn: Cuomo, mwenye umri wa miaka 53, alianza ugavana wake mapema mwaka huu na kutia saini mswada mwezi uliopita wa kuhalalisha ndoa za jinsia moja.

sentence_eng_Latn: He referred to the rumors as "political chatter and silliness".
sentence_swh_Latn: Alitaja uvumi huo kama "mapayuko na upumbavu wa kisiasa".

sentence_eng_Latn: He is speculated to make a run for president in 2016.
sentence_swh_Latn: Alifikiria kugombea urais mnamo 2016.

sentence_eng_Latn: NextGen is a system the FAA claims would allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel each year and cut carbon emissions.
sentence_swh_Latn: NextGen ni mfumo ambao Utawala wa Shirikisho la Anga unadai ungeruhusu ndege kutumia njia fupi na kuokoa mamilioni ya galoni za mafuta kila mwaka na kukata uzalishaji wa kaboni.

sentence_eng_Latn: It uses satellite-based technology as opposed to older ground-radar-based technology to allow air traffic controllers to pinpoint aircraft with greater precision and give pilots more accurate information.
sentence_swh_Latn: Hutumia teknolojia yenye msingi wa setalaiti kinyume na teknolojia ya kitambo yenye msingi wa radar ya ardhini ili kuwezesha wadhibiti wa trafiki ya anga kupata vyombo vya angani kwa usahihi zaidi na kuwapatia marubani taarifa za usahihi zaidi.

sentence_eng_Latn: No extra transport is being put on and overground trains will not stop at Wembley, and car parking and park-and-ride facilities are unavailable at the ground.
sentence_swh_Latn: Hakuna usafiri wa ziada unaowekwa na treni za juu ya ardhi hazitasimama huko Wembley, na maegesho ya magari na vituo vya kuegesha na kusafiri havipatikani huko.

sentence_eng_Latn: Fears of lack of transportation raised the possibility that the game would be forced to play behind closed doors without the team's supporters.
sentence_swh_Latn: Hofu ya ukosefu wa usafiri kulizua uwezekano kwamba mchezo huo ungelazimika kuchezwa nyuma ya milango iliyofungwa bila wafuasi wa timu hiyo.

sentence_eng_Latn: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands.
sentence_swh_Latn: Utafiti uliochapishwa Alhamisi katika jarida la Science uliripoti kuhusu kuundwa kwa spishi mpya ya ndege katika Visiwa vya Galapagos vya Kiekuado.

sentence_eng_Latn: Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.
sentence_swh_Latn: Watafiti kutoka Chuo Kikuu cha Princeton katika Marekani na Chuo Kikuu cha Uppsala katika Uswidi waliripoti spishi hiyo mpya iligeuka katika vizazi viwili pekee, ingawa mchakato huu ulikuwa unaaminika kuchukua muda mrefu zaidi, kwa sababu ya kuzaana kati ya wenyeji shorewanda wa Darwin, Geospiza fortes , na wahamiaji shorewanda wa dungusi kakati, Geospiza conirostris.

sentence_eng_Latn: Gold may be worked into all sorts of shapes. It can be rolled into tiny shapes.
sentence_swh_Latn: Dhahabu inaweza kutengenezwa ikawa maumbo tofauti tofauti. Inaweza kuvingirishwa ikawa maumbo madogo.

sentence_eng_Latn: It can be pulled into thin wire, which can be twisted and plaited. It can be hammered or rolled into sheets.
sentence_swh_Latn: Inaweza kuvutwa na kuwa waya nyembamba, ambayo inaweza kusokotwa na kusukwa. Inaweza kubabatwa au kufiringishwa kufanya bamba.

sentence_eng_Latn: It can be made very thin, and stuck onto other metal. It can be made so thin that it was sometimes used to decorate the hand-painted pictures in books called "illuminated manuscripts".
sentence_swh_Latn: Inaweza kutengenezwa nyembamba zaidi, na kukwamishwa kwenye metali nyingine. Inaweza kutengenezwa nyembamba zaidi hadi wakati mwingine ilitumika kupamba picha zilizochorwa kwa mkono zinazoitwa “miswada iliyoangazwa”.

sentence_eng_Latn: This is called a chemical's pH. You can make an indicator using red cabbage juice.
sentence_swh_Latn: Hii inaitwa pH ya kemikali. Unaweza kutengeneza kiashiria kutumia juisi ya kabichi nyekundu.

sentence_eng_Latn: The cabbage juice changes color depending on how acidic or basic (alkaline) the chemical is.
sentence_swh_Latn: Sharubati ya kabichi hubadilisha rangi kulingana na uasidi au ubesi (ualkali) wa kemikali.

sentence_eng_Latn: The pH level is indicated by the amount of Hydrogen (the H in pH) ions in the tested chemical.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kiwango cha pH huashiriwa na kiasi cha ioni za Hidrojeni (H katika pH) kwenye kemikali iliyofanyiwa jaribio.

sentence_eng_Latn: Hydrogen ions are protons that had their electrons stripped off them (since Hydrogen atoms consist of one proton and one electron).
sentence_swh_Latn: Ioni za Hidrojeni ni protoni ambazo zilibambuliwa elektroni zazo (kwani atomu za Hidrojeni huwa na protoni moja na elektroni moja).

sentence_eng_Latn: Swirl the two dry powders together and then, with clean wet hands, squeeze them into a ball.
sentence_swh_Latn: Funganya poda mbili kavu kisha, kwa mikono safi yenye unyevu, ziingize kwenye mpira.

sentence_eng_Latn: The moisture on your hands will react with the outer layers, which will feel funny and form a sort of shell.
sentence_swh_Latn: Unyevu kwenye mikono yako utaguswa na tabaka za nje, ambayo utahisi ikiwa tofauti na kuunda ganda aina fulani.

sentence_eng_Latn: The cities of Harappa and Mohenjo-daro had a flush toilet in almost every house, attached to a sophisticated sewage system.
sentence_swh_Latn: Miji ya Harappa na Mohenjo-daro ilikuwa na choo cha kisasa katika karibu kila nyumba, kilichounganishwa kwenye mfumo tata wa maji taka.

sentence_eng_Latn: Remains of sewage systems have been found in the houses of the Minoan cities of Crete and Santorini in Greece.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mabaki ya mfumo wa maji taka yamepatikana kwenye nyumba za miji ya Kiminoa ya Crete na Santorini katika Ugiriki.

sentence_eng_Latn: There were also toilets in ancient Egypt, Persia and China. In Roman civilization, toilets were sometimes part of public bath houses where men and women were together in mixed company.
sentence_swh_Latn: Pia kulikuwa na choo katika Misri, Uajemi na China ya kale. Katika ustaarabu wa Kirumi, wakati mwingine choo zilikuwa sehemu ya nyumba za bafu za umma ambapo waume na wake walichanganyika pamoja.

sentence_eng_Latn: When you call someone who is thousands of miles away, you are using a satellite.
sentence_swh_Latn: Unapompigia simu mtu aliye mbali maelfu ya maili, unatumia satelaiti.

sentence_eng_Latn: The satellite in space gets the call and then reflects it back down, almost instantly.
sentence_swh_Latn: Setilaiti iliyo angani hupata simu kisha inaiakisi tena chini, karibu papo hapo.

sentence_eng_Latn: The satellite was sent into space by a rocket. Scientists use telescopes in space because the Earth’s atmosphere distorts some of our light and view.
sentence_swh_Latn: Setalaiti ilitumwa angani kwa kutumia roketi. Wanasayansi hutumia darubini angani kwa sababu anga ya dunia huvuruga sehemu ya nuru na mtazamo wetu.

sentence_eng_Latn: It takes a giant rocket over a 100 feet high to put a satellite or telescope in space.
sentence_swh_Latn: Huhitaji roketi kubwa yenye urefu wa zaidi ya futi 100 kuweka setalaiti au darubini angani.

sentence_eng_Latn: The wheel has changed the world in incredible ways. The biggest thing that the wheel has done for us is given us much easier and faster transportation.
sentence_swh_Latn: Gurudumu limebadilisha dunia kwa njia za ajabu. Jambo kubwa zaidi ambalo gurudumu limetufanyia ni kutupatia uchukuzi rahisi na wa haraka.

sentence_eng_Latn: It has brought us the train, the car, and many other transportation devices.
sentence_swh_Latn: Imetuletea treni, gari, na vifaa vingine vingi vya uchukuzi.

sentence_eng_Latn: Under them are more medium sized cats that eat medium sized prey ranging from rabbits to antelopes and deer.
sentence_swh_Latn: Chini yake kunao paka zaidi zenye mwili wa wastani ambao hula mawindo yenye mwili wa wastani kuanzia sungura hadi swara na kulungu.

sentence_eng_Latn: Finally, there are many small cats (including loose pet cats) that eat the far more numerous small prey like insects, rodents, lizards, and birds.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mwishowe, kuna paka wengi wadogo (wakiwemo paka huru vipenzi) ambao hula mawindo madogomadogo ambayo ni mengi, kama wadudu, panya, mijusi, na ndege.

sentence_eng_Latn: The secret to their success is the concept of the niche, a special job each cat holds that keeps it from competing with others.
sentence_swh_Latn: Siri ya mafanikio yao ni dhana ya niche, kazi maalum ambayo kila paka anashikilia na inayomzuia kushindana na wengine.

sentence_eng_Latn: Lions are the most social cats, living in large groups called prides.
sentence_swh_Latn: Simba ni baadhi ya wanyama wa jamii ya paka wanaopenda ujamii zaidi, na wanaishi katika vikundi vikubwa vinavyoitwa prides.

sentence_eng_Latn: Prides are made up of one to three related adult males, along with as many as thirty females and cubs.
sentence_swh_Latn: Makundi ya simba yanatengenezwa na waume kati ya mmoja na watatu wazima wanaohusiana, pamoja na wengi wa kike kama thelathini na mashibli.

sentence_eng_Latn: The females are usually closely related to each other, being a large family of sisters and daughters.
sentence_swh_Latn: Wanawake kawaida ndio uhusiana sana wao kwa wao, kwa kuwa familia kubwa ya madada na mabinti.

sentence_eng_Latn: Lion prides act much like packs of wolves or dogs, animals surprisingly similar to lions (but not other big cats) in behavior, and also very deadly to their prey.
sentence_swh_Latn: Makundi ya simba hutenda kama makundi ya mbwa mwitu au mbwa, wanyama ambao kwa kushangaza ni sawa na simba (lakini si paka wengine wakubwa) kitabia, na pia ni hatari kwa mawindo yao.

sentence_eng_Latn: A well rounded athlete, the tiger can climb (though not well), swim, leap great distances and pull with five times the force of a strong human.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mwanariadha wa mambo anuwai, simbamarara anaweza kupanda (ingawa si vizuri), kuogelea, kuruka mbali sana na kuvuta kwa nguvu mara tano ya zile za mwanamume mwenye nguvu.

sentence_eng_Latn: The tiger is in the same group (Genus Panthera) as lions, leopards, and jaguars. These four cats are the only ones who can roar.
sentence_swh_Latn: Chui yuko kwenye kundi moja (jenasi panther) na simba, lengau na chui wa America ya kusini na kati. Hawa paka wanne pekee ndio wanaoweza kunguruma.

sentence_eng_Latn: The tiger's roar is not like the full-voiced roar of a lion, but more like a sentence of snarly, shouted words.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mgurumo wa simbamarara si kama mgurumo mkubwa wa simba, bali ni zaidi kama sentensi ya kemeo yenye maneno yanayotolewa kwa kelele.

sentence_eng_Latn: Ocelots like to eat small animals. They will catch monkeys, snakes, rodents and birds if they can. Almost all of the animals that the ocelot hunts are far smaller than it is.
sentence_swh_Latn: Paka mwitu hupenda kula wanyama wadogo. Hushika tumbili, nyoka, panya na ndege kama wanaweza. Karibu wanyama wote ambao paka mwitu huwinda ni wadogo kumliko.

sentence_eng_Latn: Scientists think that ocelots follow and find animals to eat (prey) by smell, sniffing for where they've been on the ground.
sentence_swh_Latn: Wanasayansi wanafikiria kwamba paka mwitu hufuata na kutafuta wanyama wa kula (windo) kwa harufu, kunusa ili kutafuta walikokuwa ardhini.

sentence_eng_Latn: They can see very well in the dark with night vision, and move very stealthily, too. Ocelots hunt their prey by blending in with their surroundings then pouncing on their prey.
sentence_swh_Latn: Wanaweza kuona vizuri sana kwa giza na maono ya usiku pia wanasonga kwa kimya sana. Ocelots huwinda mawindo yao kwa kujichanganya na mazingira yao kasha kurukia mawindo yao.

sentence_eng_Latn: When a small group of living things (a small population) gets separated from the main population that they came from (like if they move over a mountain range or a river, or if they move to a new island so that they can't easily move back) they will often find themselves in a different environment than they were in before.
sentence_swh_Latn: Wakati kundi dogo la vitu vilivyo hai (idadi ndogo) linatenganishwa na idadi kubwa walimotoka (kama wakipita juu ya milima au mto, au wakihamia kwenye kisiwa kigeni hivi kwamba hawawezi kurudi nyuma kwa urahisi) mara nyingi watajipata katika mazingira tofauti na walimokuwa awali.

sentence_eng_Latn: This new environment has different resources and different competitors, so the new population will need different features or adaptations to be a strong competitor than what they had needed before.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mazingira haya mapya yana rasilimali tofauti na washindani tofauti, kwa hivyo idadi mpya ya watu itahitaji vipengele au mazoea tofauti ili kuwa washindani imara kuliko walichohitaji awali.

sentence_eng_Latn: The original population hasn't changed at all, they still need the same adaptations as before.
sentence_swh_Latn: Idadi asili haijabadilika kamwe, bado wanahitaji mbinu zile zile za za awali.

sentence_eng_Latn: Over time, as the new population begins to adapt to their new environment, they start to look less and less like the other population.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kwa muda, jinsi idadi mpya inavyoanza kuzoea mazingira yao mapya, wanaanza kuonekana zaidi na zaidi tofauti na idadi ile nyingine.

sentence_eng_Latn: Eventually, after thousands or even millions of years, the two populations will look so different that they can't be called the same species.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mwishowe, baada ya maelfu au hata mamilioni ya miaka, wakazi hao wawili wataonekana tofauti sana kwamba hawawezi kuitwa spishi moja.

sentence_eng_Latn: We call this process speciation, which just means the formation of new species. Speciation is an unavoidable consequence and a very important part of evolution.
sentence_swh_Latn: Tunauita mchakato huu speciation, ambalo linamanisha uundaji wa spishi mpya. Speciation ni matokeo yasiyoweza kuepukika na sehemu muhimu sana ya mageuzi.

sentence_eng_Latn: Plants make oxygen which humans breathe, and they take in carbon-dioxide which humans exhale (that is, breathe out).
sentence_swh_Latn: Mimea hutengeneza oksijeni ambayo binadamu hupumua, na huingiza kabonidioksidi ambayo binadamu hutoa nje (yaani, kupumua nje).

sentence_eng_Latn: Plants make their food from the sun by photosynthesis. They also provide shade.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mimea hupata chakula chao kutoka kwa jua kupitia usanisinuru. Pia hupatia kuvuli

sentence_eng_Latn: We make our houses from plants and make clothes from plants. Most foods that we eat are plants. Without plants, animals could not survive.
sentence_swh_Latn: Sisi hutengeneza nyumba zetu kwa mimea na kutengeneza nguo zetu kwa mimea. Chakula kingi ambacho sisi hula ni mimea. Bila mimea, wanyama hawawezi kuishi.

sentence_eng_Latn: Mosasaurus was the apex predator of its time, so it feared nothing, except other mosasaurs.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mosasaurus ilikuwa mwindaji mkubwa wa wakati huo, kwa hivyo haikuogopa chochote isipokuwa Mosasaurus wengine.

sentence_eng_Latn: Its long jaws were studded with more than 70 razor-sharp teeth, along with an extra set in the roof of its mouth, meaning that there was no escape for anything that crossed its path.
sentence_swh_Latn: Taya zake kubwa zilikuwa na zaidi ya meno 70 kali kama wembe, pamoja na seti ya ziada kwenye paa la mdomo wake, kumaanisha kwamba chochote kilichokutana naye hakingehepa.

sentence_eng_Latn: We don't know for sure, but it may have had a forked tongue. Its diet included turtles, large fish, other mosasaurs, and it may even have been a cannibal.
sentence_swh_Latn: Hatujui kwa kweli, lakini inaweza kuwa alikuwa na ulimi uliogawanyika. Lishe yake ni pamoja na kasa, samaki wakubwa, mosasau wengine, na labda anaweza kuwa kiumbe alaye wenziwe.

sentence_eng_Latn: It also attacked anything that entered the water; even a giant dinosaur such as T. rex would be no match for it.
sentence_swh_Latn: Pia alishambulia chochote kilichoingia majini; hata dinosau mkubwa kama vile T. rex hangejimudu dhidi yake.

sentence_eng_Latn: While most of their food would be familiar to us, Romans did have their share of strange or unusual feast items, including wild boar, peacock, snails, and a type of rodent called a dormouse
sentence_swh_Latn: Wakati nyingi ya vyakula vyao tunavifahamu, Warumi walikuwa na sehemu yao ya vitu vya karamu vya kushangaza au visivyo vya kawaida, pamoja na nguruwe mwitu, tausi, konokono, na aina ya panya inayoitwa dormouse

sentence_eng_Latn: Another difference was that while the poor people and the woman ate their food while sitting in chairs, the rich men liked to have banquets together where they would lounge on their sides while they ate their meals.
sentence_swh_Latn: Tofauti nyingine ilikuwa kwamba huku watu masikini na mwanamke wakila chakula chao huku wameketi kwenye viti, watu tajiri walipenda kuwa na karamu pamoja ambapo wangepumzika kwa upande huku wakila vyakula vyao.

sentence_eng_Latn: Ancient Roman meals couldn't have included foods that came to Europe from America or from Asia in later centuries.
sentence_swh_Latn: Milo ya kale ya Kiroma haingejumuisha vyakula vilivyoingia Uropa kutoka Marekani au kutoka Asia katika karne za baadaye.

sentence_eng_Latn: For instance, they didn't have corn, nor tomatoes, nor potatoes, nor cocoa, and no ancient Roman ever tasted a turkey.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kwa mfano, hawakuwa na mahindi, wala nyanya, wala viazi, wala kakao, na hakuna Mrumi wa zamani aliyewahi kuonja batamzinga.

sentence_eng_Latn: The Babylonians built each of their gods a primary temple that was considered the home of the god.
sentence_swh_Latn: Wababeli waliwajengea kila mmoja wa miungu yao hekalu la msingi ambalo lilizingatiwa kuwa nyumba ya mungu huyo.

sentence_eng_Latn: People would bring sacrifices to the gods and the priests would try to attend to the needs of the gods through ceremonies and festivals.
sentence_swh_Latn: Watu wangeleta dhabihu kwa miungu na makuhani wangejaribu kushughulikia mahitaji ya miungu kupitia sherehe na tamasha.

sentence_eng_Latn: Each temple had an open temple courtyard and then an inner sanctuary that only the priests could enter.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kila kasri lilikuwa na uwanja wazi wa kasri na kisha mahali pa ndani patakatifu ambamo ni makasisi tu wangeweza kuingia.

sentence_eng_Latn: Sometimes special pyramid shaped towers, called ziggurats, were built to be a part of the temples.
sentence_swh_Latn: Wakati mwingine piramidi maalum zenye umbo la mnara, zinazoitwa ziggurat, zilijengwa ili ziwe sehemu ya hekalu.

sentence_eng_Latn: The top of the tower was special sanctuary for the god.
sentence_swh_Latn: Sehemu ya juu ilikuwa makao matakatifu ya mungu.

sentence_eng_Latn: In the warm climate of the Middle East, the house was not so important.
sentence_swh_Latn: Katika hali joto ya hewa ya Mashariki ya Kati, nyumba haikuwa muhimu sana.

sentence_eng_Latn: Most of the life of the Hebrew family happened in the open air.
sentence_swh_Latn: Sehemu kubwa ya maisha ya familia ya Kiebrania ilifanyikia nje.

sentence_eng_Latn: Women did the cooking in the yard; stores were just open counters looking into the street. Stone was used for building houses.
sentence_swh_Latn: Wanawake walifanya mapishi kwenye yadi; stoo zilikuwa kaunta wazi tu zilizoelekea barabarani. Mawe yalitumika kujengea barabara.

sentence_eng_Latn: There were no large forests in the land of Canaan, so wood was extremely expensive.
sentence_swh_Latn: Hakukua na misitu mikubwa kwenye ardhi ya Canaan, kwa hivyo mbao ziliuzwa kwa bei ghali mno.

sentence_eng_Latn: Greenland was settled sparsely. In the Norse sagas they say that Erik the Red was exiled from Iceland for murder, and when travelling further west, found Greenland and named it Greenland.
sentence_swh_Latn: Greenland ilikuwa na watu chache. Katika Norse sagas wanasema kwamba Erik aliye Mwekundu alifukuzwa kutoka Iceland kwa mauaji, na wakati wa kusafiri Magharibi zaidi, aliipata Greenland na kuiita Greenland.

sentence_eng_Latn: But regardless of his discovery, Eskimo tribes were already living there at the time.
sentence_swh_Latn: Lakina licha ya ugunduzi wake, makabila ya Eskimo yalikuwa tayari yanaishi huko wakati huo.

sentence_eng_Latn: Though each country was 'Scandinavian', there were many differences between the people, kings, customs and history of Denmark, Sweden, Norway and Iceland.
sentence_swh_Latn: Ingawa kila nchi ilikuwa ya 'Kiskandinavia', kulikuwa na tofauti nyingi kati ya watu, wafalme, mila na historia za Denmaki, Uswidi, Norway na Aislandi.

sentence_eng_Latn: If you have watched the movie National Treasure, you may think a treasure map was written on the back of the Declaration of Independence.
sentence_swh_Latn: Iwapo umetazama sinema ya Hazina ya Kitaifa, huenda ukafikiri ramani ya hazina iliandikwa nyuma ya Tangazo la Uhuru.

sentence_eng_Latn: However, that is not true. Although there is something written on the back of the document, it is not a treasure map.
sentence_swh_Latn: Hata hivyo, hilo si kweli. Ingawa kuna kitu kilichoandikwa nyuma ya hati, si ramani ya hazina.

sentence_eng_Latn: Written on the back of the Declaration of Independence were the words "Original Declaration of Independence dated 4th July 1776". The text appears on the bottom of the document, upside down.
sentence_swh_Latn: Nyuma ya Tangazo la Uhuru kuliandikwa maneno “Tangazo halisi la Uhuru la tarehe 4 Julai 1776”. Maandishi hayo yako katika sehemu ya chini ya hati, juu chini.

sentence_eng_Latn: While no one knows for certain who wrote it, it is known that early in its life, the large parchment document (it measures 29¾ inches by 24½ inches) was rolled up for storage.

sentence_eng_Latn: During the Revolutionary War, the thirteen states first formed a weak central government—with the Congress being its only component—under the Articles of Confederation.

sentence_eng_Latn: Taiwan beginning start way back in 15th century where European sailors passing by record the island’s name as Ilha Formosa, or beautiful island.

sentence_eng_Latn: In 1624,Dutch East India Company establishes a base in southwestern Taiwan, initiating a transformation in aboriginal grain production practices and employing Chinese laborers to work on its rice and sugar plantations.

sentence_eng_Latn: Machu Picchu consist of three main structures, namely Intihuatana, the Temple of the Sun, and the Room of the Three Windows.

sentence_eng_Latn: The age where the events took place is commonly referred as the High Middle Ages the period of European history in the 11th, 12th, and 13th centuries (AD 1000–1300).
sentence_swh_Latn: Kipindi ambacho matukio yalitokea kwa kawaida hujulikana kama Enzi za Juu za kati, kipindi katika historia ya Ulaya katika Karne za 11, 12, na 13 (1000-1300 Baada ya Kristo).

sentence_eng_Latn: The High Middle Ages were preceded by the Early Middle Ages and followed by the Late Middle Ages, which by convention ends around 1500.
sentence_swh_Latn: Enzi za Juu za Kati zilitanguliwa na Enzi za Mapema za Kati na kufuatiwa na Enzi za Mwisho za Kati, ambazo kwa mapatano zinaishia karibu 1500.

sentence_eng_Latn: Technological determinism is a term that encompasses a wide range of ideas in practice, from technology-push or the technological imperative to a strict sense that human destiny is driven by an underlying logic associated with scientific laws and their manifestation in technology.
sentence_swh_Latn: Uainishaji wa kiufundi ni kishazi ambacho hujumuisha maoni anuai katika mazoezi, kutoka teknolojia shinikizi, au maendeleo ya kiteknolojia katika dhana kuwa hatma ya binadamu huendeshwa na mantiki ya msingi inayohusishwa na sheria za kisayansi na udhihirisho wake katika teknolojia.

sentence_eng_Latn: Most interpretations of technological determinism share two general ideas: that the development of technology itself follows a path largely beyond cultural or political influence, and that technology in turn has "effects" on societies that are inherent, rather than socially conditioned.
sentence_swh_Latn: Tafsiri nyingi za udhibitisho wa kiteknolojia zinashirikisha maoni mawili ya jumla: kwamba maendeleo ya teknolojia yenyewe hufuata njia zaidi ya ushawishi wa kitamaduni au kisiasa, na teknolojia hiyo kwa upande ina "athari" kwa jamii ambazo ni za asili, badala ya hali ya kijamii.

sentence_eng_Latn: For example, one might say that the motor car necessarily leads to the development of roads.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kwa mfano, mtu anaweza kusema kwamba motokaa hupelekea ukuzaji wa barabara.

sentence_eng_Latn: However, a nationwide road network is not economically viable for just a handful of cars, so new methods of production are developed to reduce the cost of car ownership.
sentence_swh_Latn: Hata hivyo, mfumo wa kitaifa wa barabara hufai kiuchumi kwa magari machache tu, kwa hivyo mbinu mpya za uzalishaji zinakuzwa ili kupunguza gharama ya umiliki wa magari.

sentence_eng_Latn: Mass car ownership also leads to a higher incidence of accidents on the roads, which leads to the invention of new techniques in healthcare for repairing damaged bodies.
sentence_swh_Latn: Umiliki wa magari kwa wingi pia hupelekea matukio mengi ya ajali za barabarani, ambazo hupelekea uvumbuzi wa mbinu mpya katika matibabu za kutengeneza miili iliyovunjika.

sentence_eng_Latn: Romanticism had a large element of cultural determinism, drawn from writers such as Goethe, Fichte, and Schlegel.
sentence_swh_Latn: Uroma ulikuwa na kipengele kikubwa cha maamuzi ya kitamaduni yaliyochochewa na waandishi kama vile Goethe, Fichte na Schlegel.

sentence_eng_Latn: In the context of Romanticism, the geography molded individuals, and over time customs and culture related to that geography arose, and these, being in harmony with the place of the society, were better than arbitrarily imposed laws.
sentence_swh_Latn: Katika muktadha wa Uroma, jiografia ilifinyanga watu, na kwa mpito wa wakati mila na tamaduni zilizohusiana na jiografia zilizuka, na hizi, zikiwa zinapatana na hali ya jamii, zilikuwa bora kuliko sheria zilizolazimishwa kiholela.

sentence_eng_Latn: In the manner that Paris is known as the fashion capital of the contemporary world, Constantinople was regarded as the fashion capital of feudal Europe.
sentence_swh_Latn: Jinsi Paris inavyojulikana kama mji mkuu wa mitindo wa ulimwengu wa kisasa, Konstantinople ilichukuliwa kuwa mji mkuu wa mitindo wa Uropa ya kikabaila.

sentence_eng_Latn: Its renown for being an epicenter of luxury began in about 400 A.D. and lasted up until about 1100 A.D.
sentence_swh_Latn: Inajulikana kwa kuwa kitovu cha anasa ilianza takribani 400 A.D. na ilidumu hadi karibu 1100 A.D.

sentence_eng_Latn: Its status declined during the twelfth century mainly due to the fact that Crusaders had returned bearing gifts such as silks and spices that were valued more than what Byzantine markets offered.
sentence_swh_Latn: Hali yake ilizorota wakati wa karne ya kumi na mbili hasa kwa sababu ya ukweli kwamba Wapambanaji wa kidini walikuwa wamerejea na zawadi kama vile hariri na viungo vilivyokuwa na thamani ya juu kuliko vile vilivyotolewa na masoko ya Bizanti.

sentence_eng_Latn: It was at this time that the transfer of the title of Fashion Capital from Constantinople to Paris was made.
sentence_swh_Latn: Ilikuwa wakati huu ambapo uhamisho wa Jiji la Mtindo kutoka Konstantinopo hadi Parisi ulifanyika.

sentence_eng_Latn: Gothic style peaked in the period between the 10th - 11th centuries and the 14th century.
sentence_swh_Latn: Staili ya Kigothi ilifikia kilele katika kipindi kati ya karne za 10-11 na karne ya 14.

sentence_eng_Latn: At the beginning dress was heavily influenced by the Byzantine culture in the east.
sentence_swh_Latn: Hapo mwanzoni mavazi yaliathiriwa na tamaduni za Baizantini kutoka mashariki.

sentence_eng_Latn: However, due to the slow communication channels, styles in the west could lag behind by 25 to 30 year.
sentence_swh_Latn: Hata hivyo, kwa sababu ya njia hafifu za mawasiliano, mitindo ya magharibi ilibakia nyuma kwa miaka 25 hadi 30.

sentence_eng_Latn: towards the end of the Middle Ages western Europe began to develop their own style. one of the biggest developments of the time as a result of the crusades people began to use buttons to fasten clothing.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kuelekea mwishoni mwa Zama za Kati Uropa magharibi ilianza kuendeleza staili yao wenyewe. Mojawapo ya maendeleo makubwa zaidi ya wakati huo kama matokeo ya krusedi watu walianza kutumia vifungo kukazia nguo.

sentence_eng_Latn: Subsistence agriculture is agriculture carried out for the production of enough food to meet just the needs of the agriculturalist and his/her family.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kilimo cha kujikimu ni kilimo ambacho hufanywa kwa uzalishaji wa chakula cha kutosha tu kukimu mahitaji ya mkulima na familia yake.

sentence_eng_Latn: Subsistence agriculture is a simple, often organic, system using saved seed native to the ecoregion combined with crop rotation or other relatively simple techniques to maximize yield.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kilimo cha kujikimu ni mfumo rahisi, aghalabu wa kikaboni, unaotumia mbegu zilizohifadhiwa na asilia kwa eneo husika, pamoja na mzunguko wa mimea au mbinu mbadala zilizo rahisi ili kuboresha mavuno.

sentence_eng_Latn: Historically most farmers were engaged in subsistence agriculture and this is still the case in many developing nations.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kihistoria, wakulima wengi walijihusisha na kilimo cha kujikimu na hii bado ndiyo hali katika mataifa mengi yanayoendelea.

sentence_eng_Latn: Subcultures bring together like-minded individuals who feel neglected by societal standards and allow them to develop a sense of identity.
sentence_swh_Latn: Utamaduni mdogo huwaleta pamoja watu walio wa mafikira sawa na ambao wanahisi kuwa wametengwa na viwango vya kijamii na kuwaruhusu kuendeleza hisia za utambulisho.

sentence_eng_Latn: Subcultures can be distinctive because of the age, ethnicity, class, location, and/or gender of the members.
sentence_swh_Latn: Vikundi vidogo vya tamaduni vinaweza kuwa vya kipekee kwa sababu ya umri, kabila, daraja, eneo, na/au jinsia ya washiriki.

sentence_eng_Latn: The qualities that determine a subculture as distinct may be linguistic, aesthetic, religious, political, sexual, geographical, or a combination of factors.
sentence_swh_Latn: Sifa zinazofanya utamaduni mdogo kuwa wa kipekee huenda zikawa za kilugha, kiurembo, kidini, kisiasa, kijiografia au mchanganyiko wa vipengele.

sentence_eng_Latn: Members of a subculture often signal their membership through a distinctive and symbolic use of style, which includes fashions, mannerisms, and argot.
sentence_swh_Latn: Wanachama wa utamaduni mdogo mdogo kwa mara nyingi huashiria uanachama wao kupitia mitindo ya kipekee ambayo ni pamoja na mitindo ya kimavazi, tabia na lugha.

sentence_eng_Latn: One of the most common methods used to illustrate the importance of socialization is to draw upon the few unfortunate cases of children who were, through neglect, misfortune, or wilful abuse, not socialized by adults while they were growing up.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mojawapo ya mbinu maarufu zinatozumiwa kuonyesha umuhimu wa kushirikiana ni kutumia mifano michache sikitishi ya watoto ambao, kupitia mapuuza, mikosi, kunyanyaswa kimakusudi, hawakushirikishwa na watu wazima walipokuwa wanapokua.

sentence_eng_Latn: Such children are called "feral" or wild. Some feral children have been confined by people (usually their own parents); in some cases this child abandonment was due to the parents' rejection of a child's severe intellectual or physical impairment.
sentence_swh_Latn: Watoto kama hao huitwa "katili" au jeuri. Watoto wengine katili wamefungwa na watu (kwa kawaida wazazi wao wenyewe); katika hali nyingine huu kuachwa kwa watoto kulitokana na wazazi kukataa upungufu mkubwa wa kiakili au mwili kwa mtoto.

sentence_eng_Latn: Feral children may have experienced severe child abuse or trauma before being abandoned or running away.
sentence_swh_Latn: Huenda watoto wasiotagusana walipitia unyanyasaji mkuu au kiwewe utotoni mwao kabla ya kuachiliwa au kutoroka.

sentence_eng_Latn: Others are alleged to have been brought up by animals; some are said to have lived in the wild on their own.
sentence_swh_Latn: Wengine wanadaiwa kulewa na wanyama; wengine wanasemekana kuishi porini kivyao.

sentence_eng_Latn: When completely brought up by non-human animals, the feral child exhibits behaviors (within physical limits) almost entirely like those of the particular care-animal, such as its fear of or indifference to humans.
sentence_swh_Latn: Anapolelewa kabisa na wanyama wasio wa kibinadamu, mtoto katili huonyesha tabia (ndani ya mipaka ya kimwili) karibu kabisa kama zile za mnyama mahsusi wa utunzaji, kama vile hofu au upurukushani wake kwa wanadamu.

sentence_eng_Latn: While project based learning should make learning easier and more interesting, scaffolding goes a step beyond.
sentence_swh_Latn: Wakati elimu ya msingi wa mradi kunapaswa kufanya elimu kuwa rahisi na ya kupendeza zaidi, udungu huenda hatua zaidi.

sentence_eng_Latn: Scaffolding is not a method of learning but rather an aid that provides support to individuals whom are undergoing a new learning experience such as using a new computer program or beginning a new project.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mbinu za mafunzo si njia ya kusoma lakini huduma ambayo hutoa usaidizi kwa watu ambao wanapitia hali mpya ya masomo kama vile kutumia programu mpya ya kompyuta au kuanza mradi mpya.

sentence_eng_Latn: Scaffolds can be both virtual and real, in other words, a teacher is a form of scaffold but so is the little paperclip man in Microsoft Office.
sentence_swh_Latn: Majukwaa yanaweza kuwa dhahiri na pia halisi, kwa maneno mengine, mwalimu ni aina ya jukwaa lakini pia ndivyo kilivyo kile kijitu cha karatasi katika Microsoft Office.

sentence_eng_Latn: Virtual Scaffolds are internalized in the software and are meant to question, prompt, and explain procedures that may have been to challenging for the student to handle alone.
sentence_swh_Latn: Majukwaa Pepe yamewekwa ndani ya programu kwa kusudi la kuhoji, kushawishi, na kuelezea taratibu ambazo huenda zilikuwa changamoto kubwa kwa mwanafunzi kushughulikia peke yake.

sentence_eng_Latn: Children are placed in Foster Care for a wide variety of reasons that range from neglect, to abuse, and even to extortion.
sentence_swh_Latn: Watoto huwekwa kwenye Huduma ya Malezi kwa sababu nyingine nyingi ambazo huanzia kutelekezwa hadi kudhulumiwa na hata unyang’anyi.

sentence_eng_Latn: No child should ever have to grow up in an environment that is not nurturing, caring, and educational, but they do.
sentence_swh_Latn: Hakuna mtoto anayepaswa kukua katika mazingira ambayo hayaelimishi, huyajali, hayafundishi, lakini wanafanya hivyo.

sentence_eng_Latn: We perceive the Foster Care System to be a safety zone for these children.
sentence_swh_Latn: Tunadhania Mfumo wa Huduma ya Kulea kuwa eneo la usalama kwa watoto hawa.

sentence_eng_Latn: Our foster care system is supposed to provide safe homes, loving caregivers, stable education, and reliable health care.
sentence_swh_Latn: Makazi ya watoto yanastahili kutoa makao salama, walezi wenye upendo, elimu imara, na mfumo wa afya unaoaminika.

sentence_eng_Latn: Foster care is supposed to provide all the necessities that were lacking in the home they were previously taken from.
sentence_swh_Latn: Makazi ya watoto yanastahili kutoa mahitaji haya yote ambayo yalikosekana nyumbani walikotolewa awali.

sentence_eng_Latn: The Internet combines elements of both mass and interpersonal communication.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mtandao unachanganya vitu vya mawasiliano ya kundi la watu na ya kati ya mtu na mtu.

sentence_eng_Latn: The distinct characteristics of the Internet lead to additional dimensions in terms of the uses and gratifications approach.
sentence_swh_Latn: Tabia za kipekee za mtandao hupelekea vipimo zaidi kuhusu matumizi na mbinu za kuridhisha.

sentence_eng_Latn: For example, “learning” and “socialization” are suggested as important motivations for Internet use (James et al., 1995).
sentence_swh_Latn: Kwa mfano, "kujifunza" na "ushirikiano" kunapendekezwa kama vichochezi muhimu kwa matumizi ya mtandao (James na wengine, 1995).

sentence_eng_Latn: “Personal involvement” and “continuing relationships” were also identified as new motivation aspects by Eighmey and McCord (1998) when they investigated audience reactions to websites.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kushiriki kwa kibinafsi na "mahusiano endelezi" pia yalitambuliwa na Eighmey na McCord (1998) kama vipengele vipya vya motisha walipichunguza mjibizo wa hadhira katika tovuti.

sentence_eng_Latn: The use of video recording has led to important discoveries in the interpretation of micro-expressions, facial movements which last a few milliseconds.
sentence_swh_Latn: Matumizi ya video za kurekodi imesababisha uvumbuzi muhimu katika tafsiri ya sauti ndogo, kusongeshwa kwa uso ambao hudumu sekunde ndogo kadhaa.

sentence_eng_Latn: In particular, it is claimed that one can detect whether a person is lying by interpreting micro-expressions correctly.
sentence_swh_Latn: Hususan, inadaiwa kuwa mtu anaweza kutambua ikiwa mtu anadanganya kwa kufasiri ishara ndogondogo kwa njia sahihi.

sentence_eng_Latn: Oliver Sacks, in his paper The President's Speech, indicated how people who are unable to understand speech because of brain damage are nevertheless able to assess sincerity accurately.
sentence_swh_Latn: Oliver Sacks, katika gazeti lake Hotuba ya Rais, alionyesha namna watu ambao hawawezi kuelewa hotuba kutokana na uharibifu wa ubongo hata hivyo wana uwezo kwa kutathmini ukweli kwa usahihi.

sentence_eng_Latn: He even suggests that such abilities in interpreting human behavior may be shared by animals such as domestic dogs.
sentence_swh_Latn: Hata anapendekeza kwamba uwezo kama huo wa kufasiri tabia za binadamu unaweza kushirikishwa wanyama kama vile mbwa wa kufugwa.

sentence_eng_Latn: Twentieth century research has shown that there are two pools of genetic variation: hidden and expressed.
sentence_swh_Latn: Utafiti wa karne ya ishirini umeonyesha kwamba kuna makundi mawili ya utofauti wa jeni: fiche na zilizoelezewa.

sentence_eng_Latn: Mutation adds new genetic variation, and selection removes it from the pool of expressed variation.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mabadiliko huongeza tofauti za kimaumbile, na uchaguzi huyaondoa katika mkusanyiko wa tofauti zilizoonyeshwa.

sentence_eng_Latn: Segregation and recombination shuffle variation back and forth between the two pools with each generation.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mabadiliko ya uchangaji ya utengaji na uchanganyaji tena huku na huko kati ya vidimbwi hivyo viwili kwa kila kizazi.

sentence_eng_Latn: Out on the savanna, it is hard for a primate with a digestive system like that of humans to satisfy its amino-acid requirements from available plant resources.
sentence_swh_Latn: Nje kwenye savana, ni vigumu kwa wanyama wakuu waliyo na mfumo wa kuyeyusha chakula tumboni kama wa binadamu kutoshelezeza mahitaji ya tindikali-za-amino zao kutoka kwa vifaa vya mimea vilivyomo

sentence_eng_Latn: Moreover, failure to do so has serious consequences: growth depression, malnutrition, and ultimately death.
sentence_swh_Latn: Waaidha, kukosa kufanya hivyo kuna matokeo mazito: udidimiaji wa ukuaji, utapiamlo, na hatimaye kifo.

sentence_eng_Latn: The most readily accessible plant resources would have been the proteins accessible in leaves and legumes, but these are hard for primates like us to digest unless they are cooked.
sentence_swh_Latn: Rasilimali za mimea zinazofikiwa kwa urahisi zingekuwa protini zinazopatikana katika majani na kunde, lakini hizi ni ngumu kwa wale wa kundi la mammalia wa hali ya juu kama sisi kusaga isipokuwa kama zimepikwa.

sentence_eng_Latn: In contrast, animal foods (ants, termites, eggs) not only are easily digestible, but they provide high-quantity proteins that contain all the essential amino acids.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kwa kulinganisha, vyakula vya wanyama (siafu, mchwa, mayai) si kwamba vinameng’enywa kwa urahisi tu, lakini pia hutoa protini zenye kiwango kikubwa ambazo zina asidi muhimu za amino.

sentence_eng_Latn: All things considered, we should not be surprised if our own ancestors solved their "protein problem" in somewhat the same way that chimps on the savanna do today.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mambo yote yakizingatiwa, hatupaswi kushangaa kama wahenga wetu walitatua “shida yao ya protini” kwa njia sawa na zile nyani wa savanna hufanya leo.

sentence_eng_Latn: Sleep interruption is the process of purposefully awakening during your normal sleep period and falling asleep a short time later (10–60 minutes).
sentence_swh_Latn: Ukatizaji wa usingizi ni mchakato wa kuamka kimakusudi wakati wa usingizi wako wa kawaida na kupatwa na usingizi muda mfupi baadaye (dakika 10-60).

sentence_eng_Latn: This can be easily done by using a relatively quiet alarm clock to bring you to consciousness without fully waking you.
sentence_swh_Latn: Hili linaweza kufanywa kwa kutumia saa ya kengele isiyo na kelele kubwa sana ili kukufanya upate fahamu bila kukuamsha kabisa.

sentence_eng_Latn: If you find yourself resetting the clock in your sleep, it can be placed on the other side of the room, forcing you to get out of bed to turn it off.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kama utajipata ukiweka upya saa ya kengele katika usingizi wako, inaweza kuwekwa upande mwingine wa chumba, ili kukulazimu kuondoka kitandani kuizima.

sentence_eng_Latn: Other biorhythm-based options involve drinking lots of fluid (particularly water or tea, a known diuretic) prior to sleep, forcing one to get up to urinate.
sentence_swh_Latn: Chaguo zingine za midundobayolojia huhusisha unywaji mwingi (hususan wa maji au chai, dawa maarufu) kabla ya kulala, hali inayomlazimu mtu kuamka ili kwenda haja ndogo.

sentence_eng_Latn: The amount of inner peace a person possesses correlates oppositely to the amount of tension in one’s body and spirit.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kiwango cha amani ya ndani ambayo mtu humiliki huhusiana kinyume na kiwango cha mkazo ndani ya mwili na roho yake.

sentence_eng_Latn: The lower the tension, the more positive the life force present. Every person has the potential to find absolute peace and contentment.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kadiri mvuto ulivyo chini, ndivyo nguvu za maisha zilizoko zilivyo chanya. Kila mtu ana uwezo wa kupata amani na kuridhika zaidi.

sentence_eng_Latn: Everyone can achieve enlightenment. The only thing standing in the way of this goal is our own tension and negativity.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kila mtu anaweza kupata uelewa. Kitu kimoja kinachosimama njiani mwa lengo hili ni wasiwasi na uhasi wetu wenyewe.

sentence_eng_Latn: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga.
sentence_swh_Latn: Ubuddha wa Tibetani una msingi wa mafundisho ya Buddha, lakini ulipanuliwa na njia ya mahayana ya upendo na mbinu nyingi za kutoka kwa Yoga ya India.

sentence_eng_Latn: In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love.
sentence_swh_Latn: Katika kanuni, Ubudha wa Kitibeti ni rahisi sana. Una Yoga ya Kundalini, kutafakari na njia ya upendo unaokumbatia yote.

sentence_eng_Latn: With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kupitia Yoga ya Kundalini, nguvu za Kundalini (nguvu za mwangaza) huibushwa kupitia mkao wa yoga, mazoezi ya kupumua, urudiaji maneno au sauti na taswira.

sentence_eng_Latn: The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kitovu cha fikira za Tibet ni Yoga ya Uungu. Kupitia taswira ya miungu mbalimbali njia za nishati zinasafishwa, chakra zinaamilishwa na fahamu ya wongofu inaamshwa.

sentence_eng_Latn: Germany was a common enemy in World War 2, leading to cooperation between the USSR and USA. With the end of the war the clashes of system, process and culture led to the countries falling out.
sentence_swh_Latn: Ujerumani ilikuwa adui wa kawaida katika Vita vya Pili vya Dunia, hivyo kupelekea ushirikiano wa USSR na Marekani. Kwa kumalizika kwa vita mgongano wa mfumo, mchakato na utamaduni vilipelekea kutengana kwa nchi.

sentence_eng_Latn: With two years of the end of the war, the former allies were now enemies and the Cold War began.
sentence_swh_Latn: Na miaka mbili ya kumalizika kwa vita, washirika wa zamani waligeuka kuwa maadui na Vita Baridi vikaanza.

sentence_eng_Latn: It was to last for the next 40 years and would be fought for real, by proxy armies, on battlefields from Africa to Asia, in Afghanistan, Cuba and many other places.
sentence_swh_Latn: Ilikuwa idumu kwa miaka 40 ijayo na ingepigwa kwa kweli na vikosi vya kiwakala, katika nyanja za vita toka Afrika hadi Asia, katika Afghanistani, Kuba na sehemu nyingine nyingi

sentence_eng_Latn: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kufikia Septemba 17, 1939, ulinzi wa Kipolishi ulivunjwa, na tumaini la pekee lilikuwa kurudi na kujipanga tena kwa darajakuu la Kiromania.

sentence_eng_Latn: However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.
sentence_swh_Latn: Hata hivyo, mipango hii ilipitwa na wakati usiku mmoja, wakati zaidi ya askari 800,000 kutoka Jeshi Jekundu la Umoja wa Kisovyeti lilipoingia na kuunda mipaka ya Belarusiani na Ukreini baada ya kuvamia maeneo ya mashariki mwa Polandi kwa kukiuka Mkataba wa Amani wa Riga, Mapatano ya Kisovyeti-Polishi Yasiyo ya Uchokozi, na mikataba mingine ya kimataifa, pande mbili na pande nyingi.

sentence_eng_Latn: Using ships to transport goods is by far the most efficient way to move large amounts of people and goods across oceans.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kutumia meli kusafirisha bidhaa kwa kiasi kikubwa ilikuwa njia bora zaidi ya kusafirisha halaiki ya watu na bidhaa nyingi baharini.

sentence_eng_Latn: The job of navies has traditionally been to ensure that your country maintains the ability to move your people and goods, while at the same time, interfering with your enemy's ability to move his people and goods.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kazi ya Jeshi la wanamaji kwa kiasili imekuwa ni kuhakikisha kuwa nchi yako ina uwezo wa kusafirisha watu na bidhaa zako, wakati huo huo, kuzuia uwezo wa adui wako wa kuhamisha watu wake na bidhaa.

sentence_eng_Latn: One of the most noteworthy recent examples of this was the North Atlantic campaign of WWII. The Americans were trying to move men and materials across the Atlantic Ocean to help Britain.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mojawapo ya mifano maarufu ya hivi karibuni ni kampeni ya Kaskazini mwa Atlantiki ya Vita Vikuu vya Pili vya Dunia. Wamarekani walikuwa wakijaribu kusafirisha watu na vifaa kupitia Bahari ya Atlantiki ili kuwasaidia Waingereza.

sentence_eng_Latn: At the same time, the German navy, using mainly U-boats, was trying to stop this traffic.
sentence_swh_Latn: Wakati huo huo, askari wa majeshi ya Ujerumani, kwa kutumia nyambizi, yalikuwa yakijaribu kuzuia trafiki hii.

sentence_eng_Latn: Had the Allies failed, Germany probably would have been able to conquer Britain as it had the rest of Europe.
sentence_swh_Latn: Ikiwa Muungano ungeshindwa, pengine Ujerumani ingeweza kushinda Uingereza kama vile ilivyokuwa imeshinda Uropa.

sentence_eng_Latn: Goats seem to have been first domesticated roughly 10,000 years ago in the Zagros Mountains of Iran.
sentence_swh_Latn: Yaelekea mbuzi walianza kufugwa takriban miaka 10,000 iliyopita katika Milima ya Zagrosi ya Irani.

sentence_eng_Latn: Ancient cultures and tribes began to keep them for easy access to milk, hair, meat, and skins.
sentence_swh_Latn: Tamaduni na makabila ya kale yalianza kuwafuga kwa ufikiaji rahisi wa maziwa, nywele, nyama, na ngozi.

sentence_eng_Latn: Domestic goats were generally kept in herds that wandered on hills or other grazing areas, often tended by goatherds who were frequently children or adolescents, similar to the more widely known shepherd. These methods of herding are still used today.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kijumla, mbuzi wa nyumbani walianza kufugwa kwa makundi yaliyotangatanga milimani au maeneo mengine ya malisho, huku yakisimamiwa na walinzi ambao mara nyingi walikuwa watoto au vijana wachanga, sawia na wachungaji wanaofahamika sana. Mbinu hizi za ufugaji bado zinatumika hata leo.

sentence_eng_Latn: Wagonways were built in England as early as the 16th Century.
sentence_swh_Latn: Magari yanayosukokotwana farasi yalijengwa huko Uingereza mapema kama karne ya 16.

sentence_eng_Latn: Although wagonways merely consisted of parallel planks of wood, they allowed horses pulling them to achieve greater speeds and pull larger loads than on the slightly more rough roads of the day.
sentence_swh_Latn: Ingawa njia za magari zilisheheni magogo sambamba ya miti, zilihuruhusu farasi kuzivuta kwa kasi zaidi na kuvuta mizigo mikubwa kiasi kwa barabara mbaya za siku.

sentence_eng_Latn: Crossties were introduced fairly early to hold the tracks in place. Gradually, however, it was realised that tracks would be more efficient if they had a stip of iron on the top.
sentence_swh_Latn: Nguzomlalo zilianzishwa mapema kiasi ili kushikilia reli mahali pake. Hata hivyo, kadiri muda ulivyoendelea iligunduliwa kwamba reli hizo zingefanya kazi bora zaidi ikiwa kipande cha chuma kingewekelewa juu.

sentence_eng_Latn: This became common practice, but the iron caused more wear on the wooden wheels of the wagons.
sentence_swh_Latn: Hii ilikuja kuwa desturi, lakini chuma kilisababisha kuharibika kwa magurudumu ya mbao ya magari ya kukokotwa.

sentence_eng_Latn: Eventually, wooden wheels were replaced by iron wheels. In 1767, the first full-iron rails were introduced.
sentence_swh_Latn: Hatimaye, magurudumu ya mbao yalibadilishwa na magurudumu ya vyuma. Mnamo 1767, reli za kwanza za vyuma kamili zilianzishwa.

sentence_eng_Latn: The first known transportation was walking, humans began walking upright two million years ago with the emergence of Homo Erectus (meaning upright man).
sentence_swh_Latn: Namna yak kwanza ya uchukuzi iliyofahamika ni kutembea, binadaum walianza kutembea wima miaka milioni mbili iliyopita, baada ya kuibuka kwa wanadamu wima.

sentence_eng_Latn: Their predecessors, the Australopithecus did not walk upright as habitually.
sentence_swh_Latn: Watangulizi wao, Australopithecus hawakutembea wima kama kawaida.

sentence_eng_Latn: Bipedal specializations are found in Australopithecus fossils from 4.2-3.9 million years ago, although Sahelanthropus may have walked on two legs as early as seven million years ago.
sentence_swh_Latn: Utaalamu wa bipedali unapatikana katika visukuku vya Australopithekasi kuanzia miaka milion 4.2 hadi 3.9 iliyopita, ingawa inawezekana kuwa Sahelanthropasi walitembea kwa miguu miwili takriban miaka milioni saba iliyopita.

sentence_eng_Latn: We can start living more friendly to the environment, we can join to the environmental movement, and we can even be activists in order to reduce the future suffering in some degree.
sentence_swh_Latn: Tunaweza kuanza kuishi kama marafiki wazuri wa mazingira, tunaweza kujiunga na harakati za mazingira, na hata pia tunaweza kuwa wanaharakati ili kupunguza dhiki ya baadaye kwa kiwango fulani.

sentence_eng_Latn: This is just like symptomatic treatment in many cases. However, if we do not only want a temporary solution, then we should find the root of the problems, and we should deactivate them.
sentence_swh_Latn: Hii ni sawa na matibabu ya dalili katika hali nyingi. Hata hivyo, ikiwa hatutaki tu suluhisho la muda mfupi, basi tunastahili kupata shina la matatizo, nasi tupate kuizima.

sentence_eng_Latn: It is obvious enough that the world has changed much because of humankind's scientific and technological advancements, and problems have become greater because of overpopulation and mankind's extravagant lifestyle.
sentence_swh_Latn: Ni wazi kabisa kuwa ulimwengu umebadilika sana kwa sababu ya maendeleo ya kibinadamu katika sayansi na teknolojia, nayo matatizo yameongezeka kwa sababu ya watu kuwa wengi kupita kiasi na mitindo ya ubadhirifu ya maisha ya wanadamu.

sentence_eng_Latn: After its adoption by Congress on July 4, a handwritten draft signed by the President of Congress John Hancock and the Secretary Charles Thomson was then sent a few blocks away to the printing shop of John Dunlap.
sentence_swh_Latn: Baada ya kukubaliwa na Kongresi mnamo Julai 4, rasimu iliyoandikwa kwa hati ya mkono na kutiwa sahihi na Rais wa Kongresi John Hancock na Katibu Charles Thomson ilitumwa vitalu vichache kwa duka la uchapishaji la John Dunlap.

sentence_eng_Latn: Through the night between 150 and 200 copies were made, now known as "Dunlap broadsides".
sentence_swh_Latn: Usiku kucha kati ya nakala 150 na 200 zilitengenezwa, ambazo sasa zinajulikana kama “Vikaratasi vya Dunlop”.

sentence_eng_Latn: The first public reading of the document was by John Nixon in the yard of Independence Hall on July 8.
sentence_swh_Latn: Usomaji wa kwanza kwa umma wa hati hiyo ulifanywa na John Nixon katika yadi ya Ukumbi wa Uhuru mnamo Julai 8.

sentence_eng_Latn: One was sent to George Washington on July 6, who had it read to his troops in New York on July 9. A copy reached London on August 10.
sentence_swh_Latn: Moja ilitumwa kwa George Washington mnamo Julai 6, ambaye aliifanya isomewe vikosi vyake katika New York mnamo Julai 9. Nakala ilifika London mnamo Agosti 10.

sentence_eng_Latn: The 25 Dunlap broadsides still known to exist are the oldest surviving copies of the document. The original handwritten copy has not survived.
sentence_swh_Latn: Nakala 25 za Dunlap zenye cheche za mashambulizi zinazojulikana kuwahi kuwepo ndizo nakala kongwe zaidi za hati hiyo zinazopatikana. Nakala asili iliyoandikwa kwa mkono haipo.

sentence_eng_Latn: Many paleontologists today believe that one group of dinosaurs survived and is alive today. We call them birds.
sentence_swh_Latn: Wanapaleontolojia wengi leo hii wanaamini kuwa kikundi kimoja cha dinosau kiliponea na kingali hai hata sasa. Tunawaita ndege.

sentence_eng_Latn: Many people don't think about them as dinosaurs because they have feathers and can fly.
sentence_swh_Latn: Watu wengi hawawachukuliii kuwa dinosau kwa sababu wana manyoya na wanaweza kupaa.

sentence_eng_Latn: But there are a lot of things about birds that still look like a dinosaur.
sentence_swh_Latn: Lakini kuna mambo mengi juu ya ndege ambao bado wanaonekana kama dinosau.

sentence_eng_Latn: They have feet with scales and claws, they lay eggs, and they walk on their two back legs like a T-Rex.
sentence_swh_Latn: Wana miguu yenye magamba na makucha, hutaga mayai na hutembea kwa miguu yake miwili ya nyuma kama T-Rex.

sentence_eng_Latn: Virtually all computers in use today are based on the manipulation of information which is coded in the form of binary numbers.
sentence_swh_Latn: Karibu kompyuta zote zinazotumika leo zimekitwa katika kuendeshwa kwa habari ambayo imewekwa katika msimbo ulio katika hali ya nambari za bainari.

sentence_eng_Latn: A binary number can have only one of two values, i.e. 0 or 1, and these numbers are referred to as binary digits - or bits, to use computer jargon.
sentence_swh_Latn: Nambari ya bainari yaweza tu kuwa na thamani moja kati ya mbili, yaani 0 au 1, na hizi nambari zinajulikana kama takwimu jozi, au biti, katika msamiati wa kompyuta.

sentence_eng_Latn: Internal poisoning may not be immediately apparent. Symptoms, such as vomiting are sufficiently general that an immediate diagnosis cannot be made.
sentence_swh_Latn: Sumu ya ndani inaweza kukosa kuwa dhahiri papo hapo. Dalili, kama vile kutapika ni jumla kiasi kwamba utambuzi wa mara moja hauwezi kufanywa.

sentence_eng_Latn: The best indication of internal poisoning may be the presence of an open container of medication or toxic household chemicals.
sentence_swh_Latn: Dalili bora ya sumu ya ndani inaweza kuwa kuwepo kwa chombo wazi cha dawa ama kemikali za kaya zenye sumu.

sentence_eng_Latn: Check the label for specific first aid instructions for that specific poison.
sentence_swh_Latn: Angalia lebo kwa maagizo maalum ya huduma ya kwanza ya sumu hiyo.

sentence_eng_Latn: The term bug is used by entomologists in a formal sense for this group of insects.
sentence_swh_Latn: Neno mdudu hutumiwa na wanaentomolojia katika matumizi rasmi ya kikundi hiki cha wadudu.

sentence_eng_Latn: This term derives from ancient familiarity with Bed-bugs, which are insects highly adapted to parasitize humans.
sentence_swh_Latn: Nenohili limetoka kwenye kufahamiana kwa kale na Kunguni, ambao wana ustadi mkubwa wa kumelea binadamu.

sentence_eng_Latn: Both Assassin-bugs and Bed-bugs are nidicolous, adapted to living in nest or housing of their host.
sentence_swh_Latn: Wadudu Assasin-bugs na Kunguni wana uzoefu wa kuishi katika kiota ama makazi ya mwenyeji wao.

sentence_eng_Latn: Across the United States of America, there are approximately 400,000 known cases of Multiple Sclerosis (MS), leaving it as the leading neurological disease in younger and middle aged adults.
sentence_swh_Latn: Katika Amerika yote, kuna takribani kesi 400,000 zinazojulikana za Sklerosisi ya Sehemu Nyingi (MS), na kuuwacha kuwa ugonjwa wa neva unaoongoza katika vijana na watu wazima wenye umri wa kati.

sentence_eng_Latn: MS is a disease that affects the central nervous system, which is made up of the brain, the spinal cord and the optic nerve.
sentence_swh_Latn: Selerosisiwingi ni ugonjwa unaoathiri mfumo mkuu wa neva, ambao unajumuisha ubongo, uti wa mgongo na neva ya macho.

sentence_eng_Latn: Research has found that females are two times more likely to have MS then males.
sentence_swh_Latn: Utafiti umebainisha kuwa wanawake wana uwezekano maradufu wa kuugua selerosisiwingi kuliko wanaume.

sentence_eng_Latn: A couple may decide it is not in their best interest, or in the interest of their child, to raise a baby.
sentence_swh_Latn: Wenzi wawili huenda wakaamua si kwa masilahi yao bora, au masilahi ya mtoto wao, kumlea mtoto.

sentence_eng_Latn: These couples may choose to make an adoption plan for their baby.
sentence_swh_Latn: Wanandoa hawa wanaweza kuchagua kutengeneza mpango wa ulezi wa mtoto wao.

sentence_eng_Latn: In an adoption, the birth parents terminate their parental rights so that another couple may parent the child.
sentence_swh_Latn: Katika kuchukua ulezi, wazazi wa kuzaa hukomesha haki zao za mzazi ili wazazi wengine waweze kumlea mtoto huyo.

sentence_eng_Latn: Science’s main goal is to figure out the way the world works through the scientific method. This method in fact guides most scientific research.
sentence_swh_Latn: Lengo kuu la Sayansi ni kubaini njia ambayo ulimwengu utaendeshwa kwa mbinu za kisayansi. Kwa kweli, mbinu hii huongoza tafiti nyingi za kisayansi.

sentence_eng_Latn: It isn’t alone though, experimentation, and an experiment is a test that is used to eliminate one or more of the possible hypotheses, asking questions, and making observations also guide scientific research.
sentence_swh_Latn: Haiko peke yake hata hivyo, majaribio, na jaribio ni upimaji ambao hutumiwa kuondoa nadharia moja au mbili zinazowezekana, kuuliza maswali, na kufanya uchunguzi pia huongoza utafiti wa kisayansi.

sentence_eng_Latn: Naturalists and philosophers focused on classical texts and, in particular, on the Bible in Latin.
sentence_swh_Latn: Wataalam wa asili na wanafalsafa waliangazia matini za jadi, na hususan, Biblia ya Kilatini.

sentence_eng_Latn: Accepted were Aristotle's views on all matters of science, including psychology.
sentence_swh_Latn: Maoni ya Aristotle juu ya mambo yote ya sayansiyalikubalika, ikiwemo saikolojia.

sentence_eng_Latn: As knowledge of Greek declined, the West found itself cut off from its Greek philosophical and scientific roots.
sentence_swh_Latn: Jinsi maarifa ya Wagiriki yalivyopungua, Magharibi ilijikuta ikikatwa kutoka kwa asili za kifalsafa na kisayansi ya Kigiriki.

sentence_eng_Latn: Many observed rhythms in physiology and behavior often crucially depend on the presence of endogenous cycles and their production through biological clocks.
sentence_swh_Latn: Wengi walifuata mtindo katika fiziolojia na tabia ambazo mara nyingi hutegemea uwepo wa vipindi vya kiasili na uzalishaji wao kupitia mida za kibiolojia.

sentence_eng_Latn: Periodic rhythms, which are not simply responses to external periodic cues, have been documented for most living beings, including bacteria, fungi, plants, and animals.
sentence_swh_Latn: Midundo ya mara kwa mara, ambayo si jibu tu kwa ishara za nje za mara kwa mara, imerekodiwa kwa viumbe wengi wenye uhai, zikiwemo bakteria, kuvu, mimea na wanyama,

sentence_eng_Latn: Biological clocks are self sustaining oscillators which will continue a period of free-running cycling even in the absence of external cues.
sentence_swh_Latn: Saa za kibiolojia ni osileta zinazojimudu ambazo zitaendeleza kipindi cha ujiendeshaji wa mzunguko hata pasipo na vidokezo vya nje.

sentence_eng_Latn: The Hershey and Chase experiment was one of the leading suggestions that DNA was a genetic material.
sentence_swh_Latn: Jaribio la Hershey na Chase lilikuwa mojawapo ya mapendekezo kwamba DNA ilikuwa nyenzo za nasaba.

sentence_eng_Latn: Hershey and Chase used phages, or viruses, to implant their own DNA into a bacterium.
sentence_swh_Latn: Hershey na Chase walitumia virusi kuchomeka DNA yao wenyewe ndani ya bakteria.

sentence_eng_Latn: They did two experiments marking either the DNA in the phage with a radioactive phosphorus or the protein of the phage with radioactive sulfur.
sentence_swh_Latn: Walifanya majaribio mawili kuashiria DNA kwenye virusi kwa fosforasi nururifuau protini ya virusi kwa salfa nururishi.

sentence_eng_Latn: Mutations can have a variety of different effects depending on the type of mutation, the significance of the piece of genetic material affected and whether the cells affected are germ-line cells.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mabadiliko yanaweza kuwa na athari tofauti kutegemea aina ya mabadiliko, umuhimu wa kifaa cha maumbile kilichoathiriwa na ikiwa seli zilizoathiriwa ni seli za vijidudu.

sentence_eng_Latn: Only mutations in germ-line cells can be passed on to children, while mutations elsewhere can cause cell-death or cancer.
sentence_swh_Latn: Ni mabadiliko ya seli za vijidudu tu ambayo yanaweza kusambazwa kwa watoto, huku mabadiliko kwingineko yakiweza kusababisha seli za kifo au saratani.

sentence_eng_Latn: Nature-based tourism attracts people interested in visiting natural areas for the purpose of enjoying the scenery, including plant and animal wildlife.
sentence_swh_Latn: Utalii wa asili huvutia watu walio na nia ya kutembelea maeneo ya asili kwa sababu ya kuburudishwa na maadhari, pamoja na mimea na wanyama.

sentence_eng_Latn: Examples of on-site activities include hunting, fishing, photography, bird watching, and visiting parks and studying information about the ecosystem.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mifano ya shughuli za eneoni ni pamoja na uwindaji, uvuvi, upigaji picha, kutazama ndege, na kutembelea mbuga na kusoma habari za mfumo wa ikolojia.

sentence_eng_Latn: An example is visiting, photographing, and learning about organgatuangs in Borneo.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mfano ni kutembelea, kupiga picha, na kujifunza juu ya nyani wakubwa huko Borneo.

sentence_eng_Latn: Every morning, people leave small country towns in cars to go their workplace and are passed by others whose work destination is the place they have just left.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kila asubuhi, watu huondoka miji midogo mashambani ndani ya magari wakielekea kazini wakipitana na wengine ambao wanaelekea kazini walikotoka wao.

sentence_eng_Latn: In this dynamic transport shuttle everyone is somehow connected with, and supporting, a transport system based on private cars.
sentence_swh_Latn: Katika chombo hiki imara cha usafiri, kila mtu kwa njia fulani ameunganishwa na, na kuunga mkono, mfumo wa usafiri unaotegemea magari ya kibinafsi.

sentence_eng_Latn: Science now indicates that this massive carbon economy has dislodged the biosphere from one of its stable states that has supported human evolution for the past two million years.
sentence_swh_Latn: Sayansi sasa inaashiria kuwa uchumi huu mkubwa wa kaboni umeondoa nyanjahai ya dunia kutoka mojawapo ya hali zake imara ambayo ilipaswa kushikilia mageuzi ya mwanadamu kwa miaka milioni mbili iliyopita.

sentence_eng_Latn: Everyone participates in society and uses transportation systems. Almost everyone complains about transportation systems.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kila mtu hushiriki katika jamii na kutumia mifumo ya uchukuzi. Karibu kila mtu hulalamika kuhusu mifumo ya uchukuzi.

sentence_eng_Latn: In developed countries you seldom hear similar levels of complaints about water quality or bridges falling down.
sentence_swh_Latn: Katika nchi zilizostawi ni nadra kusikia viwango sawa vya malalamiko kuhusu ubora wa maji au uporomokaji wa madaraja.

sentence_eng_Latn: Why do transportation systems engender such complaints, why do they fail on a daily basis? Are transportation engineers just incompetent? Or is something more fundamental going on?
sentence_swh_Latn: Ni kwa nini mifumo ya usafiri huweka hisia kwenye malalamiko kama hayo, kwa nini wao hufeli kila siku? Ni kwamba wahandisi wa usafiri hawajiwezi? Au kuna kitu cha msingi zaidi kinachoendelea?

sentence_eng_Latn: Traffic Flow is the study of the movement of individual drivers and vehicles between two points and the interactions they make with one another.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mtiririko wa Trafiki ni utafiti wa mwondoko wa madereva binafsi na magari kati ya sehemu mbili na mwingiliano wanaofanya na wenzao.

sentence_eng_Latn: Unfortunately, studying traffic flow is difficult because driver behavior cannot be predicted with one-hundred percent certainty.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kwa bahati mbaya, kutafiti mtiririko wa trafiki ni vigumu kwa sababu tabia ya dereva haiwezi kutabiriwa kwa uhakika wa asilimia mia moja.

sentence_eng_Latn: Fortunately, drivers tend to behave within a reasonably consistent range; thus, traffic streams tend to have some reasonable consistency and can be roughly represented mathematically.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kwa bahati, madereva huwa na mazoea kwa upatano fulani; kwa hivyo, misongamano ya trafiki huwa na uthabiti fulani na inaweza kuwakilishwa haswa kitakwimu.

sentence_eng_Latn: To better represent traffic flow, relationships have been established between the three main characteristics: (1) flow, (2) density, and (3) velocity.
sentence_swh_Latn: Ili kuwakilisha mtiririko wa trafiki vizuri, uhusiano umeanzishwa kati ya hali tatu kuu: (1) mtiririko, (2) uzito, (3) kasimwelekeo.

sentence_eng_Latn: These relationships help in planning, design, and operations of roadway facilities.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mahusiano haya husaidia katika upangaji, kubuni, na uendeshaji wa welekevu barabarani.

sentence_eng_Latn: Insects were the first animals to take to the air. Their ability to fly helped them evade enemies more easily and find food and mates more efficiently.
sentence_swh_Latn: Wadudu ndio waliokuwa wanyama wa kwanza kupaa angani. Uwezo wao wa kupaa uliwasaidia kuwakwepa maadui kwa urahisi na kupata chakula na wenzi wao kwa urahisi.

sentence_eng_Latn: Most insects have the advantage of being able to fold their wings back along the body.
sentence_swh_Latn: Wadudu wengi wana bahati ya kuweza kufunga mbawa zao mwilini.

sentence_eng_Latn: This gives them a wider range of small places to hide from predators.
sentence_swh_Latn: Hii huwapa fursa pana ya sehemu ndogondogo za kujificha na adui wao.

sentence_eng_Latn: Today, the only insects that cannot fold back their wings are dragon flies and mayflies.
sentence_swh_Latn: Siku hizi, wadudu pekee ambao hawawezi kukunja mabawa yao kwenda nyuma ni kerengende na kipupe.

sentence_eng_Latn: Thousands of years ago, a man called Aristarchus said that the Solar System moved around the Sun.
sentence_swh_Latn: Maelfu ya miaka iliyopita, mwanamume aliyeitwa Aristarchus alisema kwamba Mfumo wa Jua ulizunguka Jua.

sentence_eng_Latn: Some people thought he was right but many people believed the opposite; that the Solar System moved around the Earth, including the Sun (and even the other stars).
sentence_swh_Latn: Baadhi ya watu walidhani alikuwa sahihi lakini watu wengi waliamini kinyume chake; kwamba Mfumo wa Jua huzunguuka Dunia, pamoja na Jua (na hat nyota nyinginezo).

sentence_eng_Latn: This seems sensible, because the Earth doesn't feel as if it's moving, does it?
sentence_swh_Latn: Hii inaonekana kuwa busara, kwa sababu Dunia haionekani kana kwamba inasonga, au sivyo?

sentence_eng_Latn: The Amazon River is the second longest and the biggest river on Earth. It carries more than 8 times as much water as the second biggest river.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mto wa Amazon ndiyo mto wa pili kwa urefu na kubwa zaidi Duniani. Inachukua maji zaidi ya mara 8 kama mto wa pili mkubwa.

sentence_eng_Latn: The Amazon is also the widest river on Earth, at times six miles wide.
sentence_swh_Latn: Amazon pia ni mto mpana zaidi Duniani, wakati mwingine maili sita kwa upana.

sentence_eng_Latn: A full 20 percent of the water that pours out of the planet's rivers into the oceans comes from the Amazon.
sentence_swh_Latn: Asilimia 20 kamili ya maji ambayo yanatoka kwenye mito ya sayari kuenda ndani ya bahari hutoka kwenye Amazoni.

sentence_eng_Latn: The main Amazon River is 6,387 km (3,980 miles). It collects water from thousands of smaller rivers.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mto mkuu wa Amazon una kilomita 6,387 (maili 3,980). Hukusanya maji kutoka maelfu ya mito midogo.

sentence_eng_Latn: Although pyramid-building in stone continued until the end of the Old Kingdom, the pyramids of Giza were never surpassed in their size and the technical excellence of their construction.
sentence_swh_Latn: Ingawa ujenzi wa piramidi kwa mawe uliendelea hadi mwishoni mwa Ufalme Mzee, piramidi za Giza hazikuwahi kupitwa katika saizi yazo na ubora wa kiufundi wa ujenzi wazo.

sentence_eng_Latn: New Kingdom ancient Egyptians marvelled at their predecessors monuments, which were then well over a thousand year old.
sentence_swh_Latn: Wamisri wa kale wa Ufalme mpya walishangazwa na minara ya watangulizi wao, ambayo ilikuwa wakati huo na zaidi ya miaka elfu.

sentence_eng_Latn: Vatican City's population is around 800. It is the smallest independent country in the world and the country with the lowest population.
sentence_swh_Latn: Idadi ya watu Jijini Vatican ni takriban 800. Ndio taifa ndogo kabisa duniani lililo huru na nchi yenye idadi ndogo kabisa ya watu.

sentence_eng_Latn: Vatican City uses Italian in its legislation and official communications.
sentence_swh_Latn: Jiji la Vatikani hutumia Kiitaliano katika sheria zake na mawasiliano rasmi.

sentence_eng_Latn: Italian is also the everyday language used by most of those who work in the state while Latin is often used in religious ceremonies.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kiitaliano pia ni lugha ya kila siku inayotumika na wengi wa wale wanaofanya kazi katika serikali huku Kilatini mara nyingi kikitumika katika sherehe za kidini.

sentence_eng_Latn: All citizens of Vatican City are Roman Catholic.
sentence_swh_Latn: Wananchi wote wa Mji wa Vatican ni Wakatoliki ya Kiroma.

sentence_eng_Latn: People have known about basic chemical elements such as gold, silver, and copper from antiquity, as these can all be discovered in nature in native form and are relatively simple to mine with primitive tools.
sentence_swh_Latn: Watu wameshajua kuhusu elementi za kimsingi za kemikali kama vile dhahabu, fedha, na shaba kutoka zamani, kwani hizi zote zinaweza kugunduliwa kwa maumbile katika hali ya asili na ni rahisi kuchimbuliwa kwa kutumia zana za zamani.

sentence_eng_Latn: Aristotle, a philosopher, theorised that everything is made up of a mixture of one or more of four elements. They were earth, water, air, and fire.

sentence_eng_Latn: Alloys are basically a mixture of two or more metals. Don't forget that there are many elements on the periodic table.

sentence_eng_Latn: Content theories are centered on finding what makes people tick or appeals to them.

sentence_eng_Latn: Generally speaking, two behaviors can emerge as managers begin to lead their former peers. One end of the spectrum is trying to remain “one of the guys” (or gals).

sentence_eng_Latn: They often have more autonomy than conventional team members as their teams may meet according to varying time zones which may not be understood by their local management.

sentence_eng_Latn: The presence of a true “invisible team” (Larson and LaFasto, 1989, p109) is also a unique component of a virtual team.

sentence_eng_Latn: Why would an organization want to go through the time consuming process of establishing a learning organization? One goal for putting organizational learning concepts into practice is innovation.

sentence_swh_Latn: Unaweza kutumia boda-boda (teksi ya pikipiki) kuzunguka Goma. Nauli ya kawaida kwa wenyeji ni Franki 500 za Kongo kwa safari fupi.

sentence_eng_Latn: Combined with its relative inaccessibility, "Timbuktu" has come to be used as a metaphor for exotic, distant lands.
sentence_swh_Latn: Pamoja na kutofikika kwake kwa wastani, “Timbuktu” imekuja kutumika kama sitiari ya nchi za kigeni zilizo mbali sana.

sentence_eng_Latn: Today, Timbuktu is an impoverished town, although its reputation makes it a tourist attraction, and it has an airport.
sentence_swh_Latn: Leo hii, Timbuktu ni mji maskini, ingawa sifa zake huufanya kivutio cha watalii, na pia kuna uwanja wa ndege.

sentence_eng_Latn: In 1990, it was added to the list of world heritage sites in danger, due to the threat of desert sands.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mnamo 1990, uliongezwa katika orodha ya maeneo ya urithi duniani yaliyo hatarini, kwa sababu ya tishio la mchanga wa jangwani.

sentence_eng_Latn: It was one of the major stops during Henry Louis Gates' PBS special Wonders of the African World.
sentence_swh_Latn: Ilikuwa mojawapo ya vituo vikuu wakati wa Maajabu ya Dunia ya Kiafrika spesheli ya PBS ya Henry Louis Gates..

sentence_eng_Latn: The city is in stark contrast to the rest of the country's cities, because it has more of an Arabic flair than of an African.
sentence_swh_Latn: Jiji hilo liko katika ulinganishi mgumu na miji mingine ya nchi, kwa sababu lina wangavu zaidi wa Kiarabu kuliko ule wa Kiafrika.

sentence_eng_Latn: The Kruger National Park (KNP) lies in the north-east of South Africa and runs along the border of Mozambique in the east, Zimbabwe in the north, and the southern border is the Crocodile River.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mbuga ya Kitaifa ya Kruger (KNP) iko kaskazini-mashariki mwa Afrika Kusini na inapakana na Msumbiji upande wa mashariki, Zimbabwe upande wa kaskazini, na Mto wa Mamba upande wa kusini.

sentence_eng_Latn: The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided in 14 different ecozones, each supporting different wildlife.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mbuga hiyo inachukua kilomita 19,500 mraba na imegawanywa katika maeneo 14 tofauti ya ekolojia , kila moja ikisaidia wanyama tofauti wa porini.

sentence_eng_Latn: It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and it is considered the flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks).
sentence_swh_Latn: Ni mojawapo ya vivutio vya Afrika Kusini na huzingatiwa kuwa kuu kati ya Mbuga za Kitaifa za Afrika Kusini (SANParks).

sentence_eng_Latn: As with all South African National Parks, there are daily conservation and entry fees for the park.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kama ilivyo na Mbuga zote za Wanyama za Kitaifa Kusini mwa Afrika, kuna malipo ya kila siku ya uhifadhi na kiingilio.

sentence_eng_Latn: It may also be beneficial for one to buy a Wild Card, which provides entry to either selections of parks in South Africa or all of the South African National Parks.
sentence_swh_Latn: Inaweza kuwa manufaa kwa mtu kununua Kadi Mbugani, ambayo hutoa kiingilio kwa baadhi ya mbuga za Afrika Kusini au Mbuga zote za Kitaifa za Afrika Kusini.

sentence_eng_Latn: Hong Kong Island gives the territory of Hong Kong its name and is the place that many tourists regard as the main focus.
