sentence_swh_Latn: Kisiwa cha Hong Kong hulipatia eneo la Hong Kong jina lake na ni mahali ambapo watalii wengi huangazia sana.

sentence_eng_Latn: The parade of buildings that make the Hong Kong skyline has been likened to a glittering bar chart that is made apparent by the presence of the waters of Victoria Harbour.
sentence_swh_Latn: Msururu wa majengo yanayojenga wingu la Hong Kong umeoanishwa na chati ya baa inayopendeza na ambayo yamkini imeundwa kwa uwepo wa maji ya Bandari ya Viktoria.

sentence_eng_Latn: To get the best views of Hong Kong, leave the island and head for the Kowloon waterfront opposite.
sentence_swh_Latn: Ili kujionea Hong Kong vizuri zaidi, ondoka kiswani kisha uelekee upande wa mwambao wa Kowloon ulio mkabala.

sentence_eng_Latn: The great majority of Hong Kong Island's urban development is densely packed on reclaimed land along the northern shore.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mengi ya maendeleo ya mji ya Visiwa vya Hong Kong yamesongamana katika ardhi iliyorejeshwa katika ufuo wa kaskazini.

sentence_eng_Latn: This is the place the British colonisers took as their own and so if you are looking for evidence of the territory's colonial past, this is a good place to start.
sentence_swh_Latn: Hapa ndipo mahali wakoloni wa Kiingereza walichukulia kuwa pao na kwa hivyo kama unatafuta ushahidi wa zama za kikoloni wa eneo, hapa ni mahali pazuri pa kuanza.

sentence_eng_Latn: The Sundarbans are the largest littoral mangrove belt in the world, stretching 80 km (50 mi) into the Bangladeshi and Indian hinterland from the coast.
sentence_swh_Latn: Sandabani ndizo mikoko mikubwa zaidi ya ukanda wa pwani duniani, yenye urefu wa kilomita 80 (maili 50) ndani ya Bangladeshi na bara ya Indi kutoka pwani.

sentence_eng_Latn: The Sundarbans has been declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The part of the forest within Indian territory is called Sundarbans National Park.
sentence_swh_Latn: Sandarbans imetangazwa kuwa Eneo la Urithi wa Dunia la UNESCO. Sehemu ya msitu ndani ya wilaya ya India inaitwa Mbuga ya Kitaifa ya Sandarbans.

sentence_eng_Latn: The forests aren't just mangrove swamps though — they include some of the last remaining stands of the mighty jungles which once covered the Gangetic plain.
sentence_swh_Latn: Misitu hiyo si mikoko ya mabwawa tu - inajumuisha baadhi ya misitu mikuu iliyosalia ambayo kwa wakati mmoja ilikuwa imefunikwa na tambarare ya Gaengitiki.

sentence_eng_Latn: The Sundarbans cover an area of 3,850 km², of which about one-third is covered in water/marsh areas.
sentence_swh_Latn: Sundarban zimo katika eneo la kilomita 3,850 mraba, ambapo theluthi moja imefunikwa kwa maji/kinamasi.

sentence_eng_Latn: Since 1966 the Sundarbans have been a wildlife sanctuary, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.
sentence_swh_Latn: Tangu mwaka wa 1966 Sandabani zimekuwa mbuga za wanyama pori, na inakadiriwa kuwa sasa kuna chui 400 wa Royal Bengal na kulungu takribani 30,000 katika eneo hilo.

sentence_eng_Latn: Buses depart the inter-district bus station (across the river) throughout the day, though most, especially those heading to the east and Jakar/Bumthang leave between 06:30 and 07:30.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mabasi huondoka kituo cha basi cha kati ya mawilaya (upande mwingine wa mto) siku nzima, ingawa mengi, haswa yale yanaoelekea mashariki na Jakar / Bumthang huondoka kati ya saa 6 na dakika 30 na saa 7 na dakika 30.

sentence_eng_Latn: As the inter-district buses are often full, it is advisable to purchase a ticket a few days in advance.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kwa kuwa mara nyingi mabasi yanayounganisha wilaya huwa yamejaa, inashauriwa kununua tikiti siku kadhaa mapema.

sentence_eng_Latn: Most districts are served by small Japanese Coaster Buses, which are comfortable and sturdy.
sentence_swh_Latn: Wilaya nyingi huhudumiwa na Mabasi madogo ya Pwani ya Kijapani, ambayo ni ya starehe na imara.

sentence_eng_Latn: Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable means to travel to nearby places, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).
sentence_swh_Latn: Teksi zilizoshirikiwa ni aina haraka na starehe ya kusafiri katika maeneo ya karibu, kama vile Paro (Nu 150) na Punakha (Nu 200).

sentence_eng_Latn: The Oyapock River Bridge is a cable-stayed bridge. It spans the Oyapock River to link the cities of Oiapoque in Brazil and Saint-Georges de l'Oyapock in French Guiana.
sentence_swh_Latn: Daraja la Mto wa Oyapock ni daraja lililokaa kwa waya. Linatoka Mto Oyapock na kuunganisha miji ya Oiapoque nchini Brazil na Saint-Georges de I’Oyapock iliyo Guiana ya Ufaransa.

sentence_eng_Latn: The two towers rise to a height of 83 meters, it's 378 meters long and it has two lanes of 3.50 m wide.
sentence_swh_Latn: Minara hiyo miwili inainuka hadi urefu wa mita 83, ina urefu wa mita 378 na ina leni mbili zenye upana wa mita 3.50.

sentence_eng_Latn: The vertical clearance under the bridge is 15 meters. Construction was completed in August 2011, it didn't open to traffic until March 2017.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kibali cha wima chini ya daraja ni mita 15. Ujenzi ulikamilika mnamo Agosti 2011, haikufunguliwa kwa trafiki hadi Machi 2017.

sentence_eng_Latn: The bridge is scheduled to be fully operational in September 2017, when the Brazilian customs checkpoints are expected to be finished.
sentence_swh_Latn: Daraja limeratibiwa kufanya kazi kikamilifu mnamo Septemba 2017, wakati vituo vya ukaguzi wa forodha vya Kibrazili vinatarajiwa kukamilishwa.

sentence_eng_Latn: The Guaraní were the most significant indigenous group inhabiting what is now Eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunters who also practised subsistence agriculture.
sentence_swh_Latn: Waguaraní walikuwa kundi lenye maana zaidi ambalo linakaa kule ambako sasa kunaitwa Paragwai Mashariki, wakiishi kama wawindaji wahamahama ambao pia walikuwa wakilima mazao ya kujikimu.

sentence_eng_Latn: The Chaco region was home to other groups of indigenous tribes such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering and fishing.
sentence_swh_Latn: Eneo la Chako lilikuwa nyumbani mwa vikundi vingine vya kienyeji kama vile Guaycurú na Payaguá, ambao waliishi kwa uwindaji, ukusanyaji na uvuvi.

sentence_eng_Latn: In the 16th century Paraguay, formerly called "The Giant Province of the Indies", was born as a result of the encounter of Spanish conquerors with the native indigenous groups.
sentence_swh_Latn: Katika karne ya 16, Parague, iliyojulikana awali kama "Jitu la Mkoa wa Indi", ilizaliwa kufuatia makabiliano kati ya washindi wa Kihispania na makundi asilia.

sentence_eng_Latn: The Spaniards started the colonization period which lasted for three centuries.
sentence_swh_Latn: Wahispania walianza kipindi cha ukoloni ambacho kilidumu kwa karne tatu.

sentence_eng_Latn: Since the foundation of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay has managed to keep a lot of its indigenous character and identity.
sentence_swh_Latn: Tangu msingi wa Asuncion mnamo 1537, Paraguai imeweza kudumisha sifa na utambulisho wake wa kienyeji.

sentence_eng_Latn: Argentina is well known for having one of the best polo teams and players in the world.
sentence_swh_Latn: Ajentina inajulikana vizuri kwa kuwa na mojawapo ya timu na wachezaji bora wa polo ulimweguni.

sentence_eng_Latn: The largest tournament of the year takes place in December at the polo fields in Las Cañitas.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mchuano mkubwa zaidi wa mwaka utafanyika mnamo Desemba kwenye nyanja za polo katika Las Kanitas.

sentence_eng_Latn: Smaller tournaments and matches can also be seen here at other times of the year.
sentence_swh_Latn: Michuano na mechi ndogo zinaweza pia kuonekana kutoka hapa katika nyakati nyingine za mwaka.

sentence_eng_Latn: For news on tournaments and where to buy tickets for polo matches, check Asociacion Argentina de Polo.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kwa habari kuhusu michuano na mahali pa kununua tikiti za mechi za polo, angalia Asociacion Argentina de Polo.

sentence_eng_Latn: The official Falklands currency is the Falkland pound (FKP) whose value is set equivalent to that of one British pound (GBP).
sentence_swh_Latn: Sarafu rasmi ya Falkilandi ni pauni ya Falkilandi (FKP) ambayo thamani yake inakadiriwa kuwa sawa na ile pauni moja ya Uingereza (GBP).

sentence_eng_Latn: Money can be exchanged at the only bank in the islands which is located in Stanley across from the FIC West store.
sentence_swh_Latn: Pesa zinaweza kubadilishwa katika benki ya pekee visiwani ambayo inapatikana Stanley mkabala na duka la FIC West.

sentence_eng_Latn: British pounds will generally be accepted anywhere in the islands and within Stanley credit cards and United States dollars are also often accepted.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kwa jumla pauni za Uingereza zitakubaliwa mahali popote katika visiwa, na ndani ya Stanley kadi za mikopo na dola za Marekani pia hukubaliwa mara nyingi.

sentence_eng_Latn: On the outlying islands credit cards will probably not be accepted, although British and United States currency may be taken; check with the owners in advance to determine what is an acceptable payment method.
sentence_swh_Latn: Katika visiwa vya nje kadi za mkopo huenda zisikubalike, ingawa pesa za Uingereza na Amerika zinaweza kuchukuliwa; angalia na wamiliki mapema ili kujua ni njia gani ya malipo inayokubalika.

sentence_eng_Latn: It is nearly impossible to exchange Falklands currency outside of the islands, so exchange money prior to leaving the islands.
sentence_swh_Latn: Haiwezekani kubadilishana sarafu ya Falkland nje ya visiwa, kwa hivyo badilisha pesa kabla ya kuondoka kwenye visiwa.

sentence_eng_Latn: Since Montevideo is south of the Equator, it is summer there when it's winter in the Northern Hemisphere and vice versa.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kwa kuwa Montevideo imo kusini mwa Ikweta, huko huwa ni msimu wa kiangazi wakati Nyanda ya Kaskazini ni baridi na kinyume chake.

sentence_eng_Latn: Montevideo is in the subtropics; in the summer months, temperatures above +30°C are common.
sentence_swh_Latn: Montevideo iko upande wa sabutropiki; katika miezi ya kiangazi, hali ya joto zaidi ya +30ºC ni hali ya kawaida.

sentence_eng_Latn: The winter can be deceptively chilly: temperatures rarely go below freezing, but the wind and humidity combine to make it feel colder than what the thermometer says.
sentence_swh_Latn: Msimu wa baridi unaweza kuwa baridi kidanganyifu: kadiri ya joto kwa mara chache sana huenda chini ya kiwango cha kugandisha, lakini upepo na unyevu huchanganyika na kufanya kuwe na baridi zaidi kuliko ile ambayo kipimajoto kinasema.

sentence_eng_Latn: There are no particular "rainy" and "dry" seasons: the amount of rain stays roughly the same throughout the year.
sentence_swh_Latn: Hakuna vipindi maalum vya “mvua” au “ukavu”: kiwango cha mvua hubaki takribani sawa mwaka mzima.

sentence_eng_Latn: Though many of the animals in the park are used to seeing humans, the wildlife is nonetheless wild and should not be fed or disturbed.
sentence_swh_Latn: Ingawa wanyama wengi mbugani wamezoea kuwaona wanadamu, kwa vyovyote wanyapori ni wa mwituni, wala hawastahili kulishwa au kusumbuliwa.

sentence_eng_Latn: According to park authorities, stay at least 100 yards/meters away from bears and wolves and 25 yards/meters from all other wild animals!
sentence_swh_Latn: Kwa mujibu wa usimamizi wa mbuga, kaa walau yadi/mita 100 mbali na dubu na mbwa mwitu na yadi/mita 25 kutoka kwa wanyama mwitu wengine wote!

sentence_eng_Latn: No matter how docile they may look, bison, elk, moose, bears, and nearly all large animals can attack.
sentence_swh_Latn: Haijalishi jinsi watulivu wanavyokaa, baisani, elki, kongoni, dubu, na karibu wanyama wote wakubwa wanaweza kushambulia.

sentence_eng_Latn: Each year, dozens of visitors are injured because they didn't keep a proper distance. These animals are large, wild, and potentially dangerous, so give them their space.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kila mwaka, dazeni za wageni huumia kwa sababu hawakuzingatia umbali unaofaa. Wanyama hawa ni wakubwa, wa mwitu, na uwezekano wa kuwa hatari, kwa hivyo wape nafasi yao.

sentence_eng_Latn: In addition, be aware that odors attract bears and other wildlife, so avoid carrying or cooking odorous foods and keep a clean camp.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kwa kuongezea, fahamu kuwa harufu huwavutia dubu na wanyama wengine mwitu, kwa hivyo epuka kubeba au kupika vyakula vyenye harufu na utunze usafi kwenye kambi.

sentence_eng_Latn: Apia is the capital of Samoa. The town is on the island of Upolu and has a population of just under 40,000.
sentence_swh_Latn: Apia ni mji mkuu wa Samoa. Mji huo uko kwenye kisiwa cha Upolu na lina watu chini ya 40,000.

sentence_eng_Latn: Apia was founded in the 1850s and has been the official capital of Samoa since 1959.
sentence_swh_Latn: Apia ilianzishwa miaka ya 1850 na imekuwa mji mkuu rasmi wa Samoa tangu 1959.

sentence_eng_Latn: The harbor was the site of an infamous naval standoff in 1889 when seven ships from Germany, the US, and Britain refused to leave the harbor.
sentence_swh_Latn: Bandari ilikuwa sehemu ya kutokabiliana maarufu kwa nevi mnamo 1889 wakati meli saba kutoka Ujerumani, Marekani na Uingereza zilikataa kuondoka kwenye bandari.

sentence_eng_Latn: All the ships were sunk, except for one British cruiser. Nearly 200 American and German lives were lost.
sentence_swh_Latn: Meli zote zilizamishwa, isipokuwa meli moja ya Uingereza. Karibu maisha 200 ya Wamarekani na Wajerumani yalipotea.

sentence_eng_Latn: During the struggle for independence organised by the Mau movement, a peaceful gathering in the town resulted in the killing of the paramount chief Tupua Tamasese Lealofi III.
sentence_swh_Latn: Wakati wa mapambano ya uhuru yaliyoandaliwa na harakati ya Mau, mkutano wa amani mjini ulisababisha mauaji ya chifu mkuu Tupua Tamasese Lealofi III.

sentence_eng_Latn: There are many beaches, due to Auckland's straddling of two harbours. The most popular ones are in three areas.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kuna fukwe nyingi, kutokana na kukaliwa magamaga kwa kwa bandari mbili na Auckland. Maarufu zaidi ziko katika sehemu tatu.

sentence_eng_Latn: North Shore beaches (in North Harbour district) are on the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south.
sentence_swh_Latn: Fukwe za pwani ya Kaskazini (katika wilaya ya Kaskazini mwa Bandari) ziko kwenye Bahari ya Pasifiki na zinyooka kutoka Long Bay kaskazini hadi Devonport kusini.

sentence_eng_Latn: They are almost all sandy beaches with safe swimming, and most have shade provided by pohutukawa trees.
sentence_swh_Latn: Karibu fukwe zote ni za mchanga na uogeleaji salama na nyingi yake huwa na kivuli chini ya miti ya pohutukawa.

sentence_eng_Latn: Tamaki Drive beaches are on the Waitemata Harbour, in the upmarket suburbs of Mission Bay and St Heliers in Central Auckland.
sentence_swh_Latn: Pwani za Tamaki Drive ziko katika Bandari ya Waitemata, kwenye maeneo ya kifahari ya Mission Bay na St. Heliers katika Auckland ya Kati.

sentence_eng_Latn: These are sometimes-crowded family beaches with a good range of shops lining the shore. Swimming is safe.
sentence_swh_Latn: Hizi ni pwani za kifamilia ambazo wakati mwingine hujaa watu, zilizo na masafa ya maduka katika ufuo. Uogeleaji ni salama.

sentence_eng_Latn: The main local beer is 'Number One', it is not a complex beer, but pleasant and refreshing. The other local beer is called "Manta".
sentence_swh_Latn: Bia kuu katika eneo ni ‘Number One’, sio bia tata, ila ni zuri na hufariji. Hio bia nyingine ya mtaa huitwa ‘Manta’.

sentence_eng_Latn: There are many French wines to be had, but the New Zealand and Australian wines might travel better.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kuna aina nyingi za mvinyo wa Kifaransa inavyopatikana, lakini mvinyo wa New Zealand na Australia waweza safiri bora.

sentence_eng_Latn: The local tap water is perfectly safe to drink, but bottled water is easy to find if you are fearful.
sentence_swh_Latn: Maji ya ndani ya bomba ni salama kabisa kwa kunywa, lakini maji ya chupa ni rahisi kupata iwapo una hofu.

sentence_eng_Latn: For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kwa Waaustralia, wazo la kahawa ‘nyeupe’ ni la kigeni. Nyeusi fupi ni ’espresso’, cappuccino inakuja imerundikwa zaidi na malai (si povu) na chai inaandaliwa bila maziwa.

sentence_eng_Latn: The hot chocolate is up to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are pricey but excellent.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kinywaji moto cha chokoleti kinafikia viwango vya Ubelgiji. Sharubati za matunda ni bei ghali lakini ni bora.

sentence_eng_Latn: Many trips to the reef are made all year around, and injuries due to any of these causes on the reef are rare.
sentence_swh_Latn: Safari nyingi kwenye mwamba hufanywa mwaka mzima, na majeraha kutokana na sababu yoyote baina ya hizi katika mwamba ni nadra.

sentence_eng_Latn: Still, take advice from authorities, obey all signs, and pay close attention to safety warnings.
sentence_swh_Latn: Bado, chukua ushauri kutoka kwa mamlaka, utii ishara zote, na umakinikie maonyo ya usalama.

sentence_eng_Latn: Box jellyfish occur near beaches and near river estuaries from October to April north of 1770. They can occasionally be found outside these times.
sentence_swh_Latn: Viwavi wa baharini hutokea karibu na pwani na karibu na midomo ya mto kuanzia Oktoba hadi Aprili kaskazini mwa 1770. Wakati mwingine huenda wakapatikana nje ya nyakati hizi.

sentence_eng_Latn: Sharks do exist, however they rarely attack humans. Most sharks are scared of humans and would swim away.
sentence_swh_Latn: Papa wapo, ingawa ni nadra kwao kuwashambulia binadamu. Papa wengi huwaogopa wanadamu na huogelea mbali.

sentence_eng_Latn: Saltwater Crocodiles do not actively live in the ocean, their primary habitat is in river estuaries north from Rockhampton.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mamba wa majichumvi hawaishi sana baharini, kwani makazi yao ya kimsingi ni milango ya mito kaskazini mwa Rokihamptoni.

sentence_eng_Latn: Booking in advance gives the traveller peace of mind that they will have somewhere to sleep once they arrive at their destination.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kuhifadhi mapema humpatia msafiri amani ya akili kwamba atapata mahali pa kulala atakapofika.

sentence_eng_Latn: Travel agents often have deals with specific hotels, although you may find it possible to book other forms of accommodation, like camping grounds, through a travel agent.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kampuni za uwakala wa usafiri mara nyingi huwa na ofa na hoteli maalum, ingawa unaweza kupata uwezekano wa kuhifadhi aina nyingine za malazi, kama mahali pa kupiga kambi, kupitia wakala wa usafiri.

sentence_eng_Latn: Travel agents usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation arrangements to/from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kampuni za wakala wa usafiri kwa kawaida hutoa vifurushi vya ofa ambavyo hujumuisha kiamshakinywa, mipango ya uchukuzi kwenda/kutoka kwenye uwanja wa ndege au hata vifurushi vya ndege na hoteli vilivyochanganywa.

sentence_eng_Latn: They can also hold the reservation for you if you need time to think about the offer or procure other documents for your destination (e.g. visa).
sentence_swh_Latn: Pia wanaweza kukuwekea uhifadhi iwapo unahitaji muda wa kufikiria kuhusu ofa hiyo au kupata hati nyingine za mahali unapokwenda (k.m. visa).

sentence_eng_Latn: Any amendments or requests though should be coursed through the travel agent first and not directly with the hotel.
sentence_swh_Latn: Marekebisho au maombi yoyote lazima yafuatwe kupitia wakala wa kusafiri kwanza na si moja kwa moja na hoteli.

sentence_eng_Latn: For some festivals, the vast majority of the attendants to music festivals decide to camp on site, and most attendants consider it a vital part of the experience.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kwa baadhi ya tamasha, idadi kubwa ya wanaohudhuria tamasha za muziki huamua kukita kambi kwenye eneo, na wengi wao hukuchukulia kuwa sehemu muhimu ya tajriba hiyo.

sentence_eng_Latn: If you want to be close to the action you're going to have to get in early to get a camping site close to the music.
sentence_swh_Latn: Ikiwa ungetaka kuwa karibu na matukio utahitajika kurauka mapema ili upate eneo la kukita kambi karibu na muziki.

sentence_eng_Latn: Remember that even though music on the main stages may have finished, there may be sections of the festival that will keep playing music until late into the night.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kumbuka kuwa hata muziki kwenye jukwaa kuu ukimalizika, kunaweza kuwa na sehemu za tamasha ambazo zitaendelea kucheza muziki hadi usiku wa manane.

sentence_eng_Latn: Some festivals have special camping areas for families with young children.
sentence_swh_Latn: Tamasha kadhaa zina maeneo maalumu ya kukita kambi kwa familia zenye watoto wadogo.

sentence_eng_Latn: If crossing the Northern Baltic in winter, check the cabin location, as going through ice causes quite horrible noise for those most affected.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kama unavuka Northern Baltic katika msimu wa baridi, kagua eneo la kibanda, kwani kupita katika theluji husababisha kelele mbaya kwa wale wanaoathirika zaidi.

sentence_eng_Latn: Saint Petersburg cruises include time in town. Cruise passengers are exempted from visa requirements (check the terms).
sentence_swh_Latn: Safari za baharini za Mtakatifu Petersburge hujumuisha muda wa mjini. Abiria hawa wameepushwa na mahitaji ya visa (angalia masharti).

sentence_eng_Latn: Casinos typically make many efforts to maximize time and money spent by guests. Windows and clocks are usually absent, and exits can be hard to find.
sentence_swh_Latn: Makasino kwa kawaida hufanya juhudi nyingi ili kuongeza pesa na muda unaotumika na wacheza kamari. Madirisha na saa kwa kawaida huwa hazipo na mlango wa kutoka huwa mgumu kupata.

sentence_eng_Latn: They usually have special food, drink and entertainment offers, to keep guests in a good mood, and keep them at the premise.
sentence_swh_Latn: Aghalabu huwa na chakula cha kipekee, vinywaji na matoleo ya burdani, ili kuwatumbuiza wageni na kuwatunza katika majengo yao.

sentence_eng_Latn: Some venues offer alcoholic beverages on the house. However, drunkenness impairs judgement, and all good gamblers know the importance of staying sober.
sentence_swh_Latn: Baadhi ya kumbi hutoa vileo ndani ya nyumba. Hata hivyo, ulevi hutatiza maamuzi, na wacheza kamari wote wazuri wanajua umuhimu wa kuwa watulivu.

sentence_eng_Latn: Anyone who's going to drive at high latitudes or over mountain passes should consider the possibility of snow, ice, or freezing temperatures.
sentence_swh_Latn: Yeyote ambaye atakuwa akiendesha gari maeneo yaliyoinuka au vijia vya milimani anastahili kuzingatia uwezekano wa theluji, barafu, na baridi kali.

sentence_eng_Latn: On icy and snowy roadways, friction is low and you cannot drive as if you were on bare asphalt.
sentence_swh_Latn: Katika barabara zenye barafu na theluji, msuguano uko chini na huwezi kuendesha gari kana kwamba uko katika lami tupu.

sentence_eng_Latn: During blizzards, enough snow to get you stuck can fall in very little time.
sentence_swh_Latn: Wakati wa barafu nyingi, barafu ya kutosha kukufanya ukwame inaweza kuanguka kwa muda mfupi.

sentence_eng_Latn: Visibility may also be restricted by falling or blowing snow or by condensation or ice on vehicle windows.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mwonekano unaweza pia kuzuiliwa kupitia kwa kuanguka au kuvumisha theluji au kwa mtonesho au barafu kwenye madirisha ya magari.

sentence_eng_Latn: On the other hand, icy and snowy conditions are normal in many countries, and traffic goes on mostly uninterrupted all year round.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kwa upande mwingine, mazingira ya theluji na barafu ni ya kawaida katika mataifa mengi, na uchukuzi huendelea mwaka mzima bila kutatizwa.

sentence_eng_Latn: Safaris are perhaps the greatest tourism draw in Africa and the highlight for many visitors.
sentence_swh_Latn: Pengine safari ndizo kivutio kikubwa zaidi cha watalii katika Afrika na angazio la wageni wengi.

sentence_eng_Latn: The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna.
sentence_swh_Latn: Neno safari linamaanisha kusafiri kuona Wanyama wa pori wa Afrika wanaoshangaza, haswa kwenye savanna

sentence_eng_Latn: Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, tend to approach closely to cars and standard equipment will allow good viewing.
sentence_swh_Latn: Baadhi ya wanyama, kama vile ndovu na twiga, huelekea kusogea kukaribia magari na vifaa vya kawaida vitaruhusu utazamaji mwema.

sentence_eng_Latn: Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy and you will see them better with binoculars.
sentence_swh_Latn: Simba, duma na chui wakati mwingine huwa na aibu na utawaona bora na darubini.

sentence_eng_Latn: A walking safari (also called a "bush walk", "hiking safari", or going "footing") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or several days.
sentence_swh_Latn: Safari ya miguu (ijulikanayo kama "matembezi kichakani", "safari ya kukwea", au kwenda "kwa miguu") hujumuisha ukweaji, iwe kwa saa chache au siku kadhaa.

sentence_eng_Latn: The Paralympics will take place from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held in other locations throughout Japan.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mbio za Walemavu zitaanza mnamo Agosti 24 hadi Septemba 5, 2021. Baadhi ya mashindano yatafanyika katika maeneo tofauti tofauti kote Japani.

sentence_eng_Latn: Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two summer Olympics, having hosted the games in 1964.
sentence_swh_Latn: Tokyo itakuwa mji wa kipekee wa Asia kuwahi kuwa mwenyeji wa Olimpiki mbili za kiangazi, kwani ilikuwa mwenyeji wa michezo hiyo mnamo 1964.

sentence_eng_Latn: If you booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may have a tricky situation.
sentence_swh_Latn: Ikiwa ulihifadhi nafasi ya ndege na malazi yako 2020 kabla ya uahirisho kutangazwa, unaweza kuwa na hali ya hila.

sentence_eng_Latn: Cancellation policies vary, but as of late March most coronavirus-based cancellation policies don't extend to July 2020, when the Olympics had been scheduled.
sentence_swh_Latn: Sera za kufuta zinatofautiana, lakini kufikia mwishoni mwa mwezi Machi sera nyingi za ughairi kwa sababu ya virusi vya korona hazifiki hadi Julai 2020, wakati Olimpiki ilikuwa imeratibiwa.

sentence_eng_Latn: It's expected that most event tickets will cost between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000, with typical tickets costing around ¥7,000.
sentence_swh_Latn: Inatarajiwa kwamba tiketi nyingi za hafla zitagharimu kati ya Yeni 2,500 na Yeni 130,000, na tiketi za kawaida zikigharimu takriban Yeni 7,000.

sentence_eng_Latn: Ironing damp clothes can help them dry. Many hotels have an iron and ironing board available for loan, even if one is not present in the room.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kupiga pasi nguo zilizo na maji kunaweza kuzisaidia kukauka. Hoteli nyingi zina pasi na bodi za kupigia pasi za kukodisha, hata kama mtu hayuko ndani ya chumba hicho.

sentence_eng_Latn: If an iron isn't available, or if you don't fancy wearing ironed socks, then you can try using a hairdryer, if available.
sentence_swh_Latn: Ikiwa pasi haipatikani, au ikiwa hupendii kuvaa soksi zilizopasiwa, basi unaweza kujaribu kutumia kikaushi nywele, ikiwa kinapatikana.

sentence_eng_Latn: Be careful not to allow fabric to become too hot (which can cause shrinkage, or in extreme cases, scorch).
sentence_swh_Latn: Uwe mwangalifu kitambaa kisiwe moto sana (kwani inaweza kusababisha urukaji, au katika hali mbaya zaidi, kuchoma).

sentence_eng_Latn: There are different ways of purifying water, some more effective against specific threats.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kuna njia tofauti za kusafisha maji, baadhi zikiwa na mafanikio dhidi ya vitishio maalum.

sentence_eng_Latn: In some areas boiling water for a minute is enough, in others several minutes are needed.
sentence_swh_Latn: Katika baadhi ya maeneo mengine kuchemsha maji kwa dakika moja kunatosha, kwingineko dakika kadhaa zitahitajika.

sentence_eng_Latn: Filters vary in effectiveness, and should you have a concern, then you should consider buying your water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.
sentence_swh_Latn: Vichujio hutofautiana katika utendaji, na iwapo utapatwa na wasiwasi, basi unafaa kufikiria kununua maji yako katika chupa iliyofungwa kabisa kutoka kwa kampuni tajika.

sentence_eng_Latn: Travellers may encounter animal pests that they are not familiar with in their home regions.
sentence_swh_Latn: Wasafiri wanaweza kukutana na wadudu wa wanyama ambao hawawatambui kutoka maeneo yao ya nyumbani.

sentence_eng_Latn: Pests can spoil food, cause irritation, or in a worse case cause allergic reactions, spread venom, or transmit infections.
sentence_swh_Latn: Wadudu waharibifu wanaweza kuharibu chakula, kusababisha maudhi, au katika hali mbaya kusababisha athari za mzio, kueneza sumu au kusambaza maambukizi.

sentence_eng_Latn: Infectious diseases themselves, or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people by force, do not usually qualify as pests.
sentence_swh_Latn: Maradhi yenyewe ya kuambukiza, au wanyama hatari ambao wanaweza kujeruhi au kuua watu kwa nguvu, kwa kawaida hawahitimu kama wanyama-vipenzi.

sentence_eng_Latn: Duty free shopping is the opportunity to buy goods exempted from taxes and excises at certain locations.
sentence_swh_Latn: Ununuzi bila ushuru ni nafasi ya kununua bidhaa zisizo na ushuru na kodi katika maeneo fulani.

sentence_eng_Latn: Travellers bound for countries with heavy taxation can sometimes save a considerable amount of money, especially on products such as alcoholic beverages and tobacco.
sentence_swh_Latn: Wasafiri katika nchi zinazotoza ushuru wa juu wakati mwingine wanaweza kuokoa kiwango kikubwa cha pesa, hasa kwa bidhaa kama vinywaji vyenye vileo na tumbaku.

sentence_eng_Latn: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont presents the most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, passing frequently through isolated backwoods terrain.
sentence_swh_Latn: Eneo katikati mwa Point Marion na Fairmont hutoa hali za uendeshaji gari zenye changamoto zaidi katika Barabara Kuu ya Buffalo-Pittsburgh, inayopitia mara kwa mara kwenye maeneo ya ardhi yaliyo katika misitu iliyotengwa.

sentence_eng_Latn: If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kama hujazoea kuendesha gari katika barabara za mashambani, kaa chonjo: miinuko mikali, njia nyembamba, na na pembe kali zimejaa.

sentence_eng_Latn: Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections — commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise.
sentence_swh_Latn: Viwango vya kasi vilivyotumwa viko chini kabisa kuliko vya sehemu za zamani na zilizofuata — kawaida maili 35-40 kwa saa (kilomita 56-64 kwa saa) — na utii mkali kwavyo ni muhimu zaidi kuliko vinginevyo.

sentence_eng_Latn: Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.
sentence_swh_Latn: Cha kushangaza hata hivyo, huduma ya simu ya rununu ina nguvu sana hapa kuliko tandaa zingine za njia kama Pennsylvania Wilds.

sentence_eng_Latn: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mikate ya Kijerumani ni mizuri mno, na huko Bavaria, ni bora zaidi na tofauti, sawasawa na ile ya jirani yao wa kusini, Austria.

sentence_eng_Latn: Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer.
sentence_swh_Latn: Vinyunga vya matunda ni za kawaida, na tufaa zilizopikwa kuwa vinyunga mwaka mzima, na cheri na plamu zikionekana wakati wa msimu wa joto.

sentence_eng_Latn: Many German baked goods also feature almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. Popular cakes often pair particularly well with a cup of strong coffee.
sentence_swh_Latn: Nyingi ya bidhaa za kuokwa kutoka Ujerumani huwa lozi, na karanga. Keki zilizo maarufu mara nyingi huambatana vizuri na kikombe cha kahawa kali.

sentence_eng_Latn: If you want some small though rich pastries, try what depending on region are called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.
sentence_swh_Latn: Ikiwa unataka vitumbua vidogo ingawa bora, jaribu kile ambacho kutegemea eneo kinaitwa Berliner, Pfannkuchen au Krapfen.

sentence_eng_Latn: A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables.
sentence_swh_Latn: Bizari ni chakula kilichoundwa kwa mimea na viungo, pamoja na nyama au mboga.

sentence_eng_Latn: A curry can be either "dry" or "wet" depending on the amount of liquid.
sentence_swh_Latn: Bizari inaweza kuwa "kavu" au "yenye unyevunyevu" kulingana na kiasi cha kioevu.

sentence_eng_Latn: In inland regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used.
sentence_swh_Latn: katika maeneo ya bara la Kaskazini mwa India na Pakistani, mtindi kwa kawaida hutumiwa katika mchuzi wenye viungo; Katika Kusini mwa India na mikoa mingine ya pwani ya bara ndogo, maziwa ya nazi hutumiwa sana.

sentence_eng_Latn: With 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian food is an umbrella term covering a vast variety of regional cuisines found across the nation.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kukiwa na visiwa 17,000 vya kuchagua, chakula cha Indonesia ni jina la kijumla linalosimamia aina kubwa ya vyakula vinavyopatikana kote nchini.

sentence_eng_Latn: But, if used without further qualifiers, the term tends to mean the food originally from the central and eastern parts of the main island Java.
sentence_swh_Latn: Lakini, llikitumiwa bila vivumishi zaidi, neno hilo huelekea kumaanisha chakula ambacho mwanzoni kilitoka sehemu za kati na mashariki mwa kisiwa kikuu cha Java.

sentence_eng_Latn: Now widely available throughout the archipelago, Javanese cuisine features an array of simply seasoned dishes, the predominant flavorings the Javanese favor being peanuts, chillies, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.
sentence_swh_Latn: Chakula kinachopatikana sana katika maeneo mapana ya funguvisiwa, ni vyakula vya Kijavanese vilivyotayarishwa kwa ustadi sahili, ladha yake ya kimsingi ikiwa ni njugu karanga, pilipili, sukari (hususan sukari ya nazi ya Javanese) na viungo tofauti vinavyonukia.

sentence_eng_Latn: Stirrups are supports for the rider's feet that hang down on either side of the saddle.
sentence_swh_Latn: Vikuku ni nguzo zinazoshikilia miguu ya mwendeshaji ambazo huning’inia chini katika pande zote mbili za matandiko.

sentence_eng_Latn: They provide greater stability for the rider but can have safety concerns due to the potential for a rider's feet to get stuck in them.
sentence_swh_Latn: Zinampa mpanda farasi utulivu mkubwa lakini zinaweza kuwa na wasiwasi wa kiusalama kwa sababu ya uwezo wa miguu ya mpanda farasi kukwama ndani yake.

sentence_eng_Latn: If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken.
sentence_swh_Latn: Ikiwa mwendeshaji farasi atatupwa kuotka kwa farasi lakini mguu wake ufungiwe kwenye tandiko, wanaweza kukokotwa ikiwa farasi atatoroka. Ili kupunguza hatari hii, hatua kadhaa za usalama zinaweza kuchukuliwa.

sentence_eng_Latn: First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kwanza, waendeshaji wengi huvaa kiatu cha buti kilicho juu na laini, chembamba kabisa, soli.

sentence_eng_Latn: Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kisha, matandiko mengine, hasa matandiko ya Kiingereza yana fito za kiusalama ambzo huruhusu ngozi ya kuvutwa kuangukia tandiko kama kama itavutwa nyuma na mpanda farasi anayeanguka.

sentence_eng_Latn: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags.
sentence_swh_Latn: Bonde la Cochamo – eneo kuu la makusudio ya ukweaji nchini Chile, lijulikanalo kama Yosemite ya Marekani Kusini, na kuta kubwa anuwai za matale na majabali.

sentence_eng_Latn: Summits include breath-taking views from peaks. Climbers from all parts of the world are continually establishing new routes amongst its endless potential of walls.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mikutano huwa na mandhari za kusisimua kutoka vileleni. Wapanda mlima kutoka pande zote za ulimwengu wanaendelea kuanzisha njia mpya kati ya uwezo wake wa kuta.

sentence_eng_Latn: Downhill snowsports, which include skiing and snowboarding, are popular sports involving sliding down snow-covered terrain with skis or a snowboard attached to your feet.
sentence_swh_Latn: Michezo ya theluji ya kuteremka, ambayo ni pamoja na mchezo wa kuteleza juu ya theluji na mchezo wa kupanda theluji, ni michezo maarufu inayohusisha kuteleza chini ya ardhi iliyofunikwa na theluji kwa ubaos au bao za theluji zilizofungiwa kwenye miguu yako.

sentence_eng_Latn: Skiing is a major travelling activity with many enthusiasts, occasionally known as "ski bums," planning entire vacations around skiing at a particular location.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kuteleza juu ya theluji ni shughuli kubwa huku washiriki wengi, ambao mara kwa mara hujulikana kama "ski bums," wakipanga likizo nzima kwa kuteleza juu ya theluji katika eneo fulani.

sentence_eng_Latn: The idea of skiing is very old — cave paintings depicting skiers date back as far as 5000 BC!
sentence_swh_Latn: Wazo la uendeshaji ubao kwenye theluji ni la zamani sana - michoro ya pango inaonyesha waendeshaji wa ubao kwenye theluji wa miaka ya zamani ya hadi 5000 KK!

sentence_eng_Latn: Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mchezo wa kuteleza kwa kasi kwenye mteremko wenye theluji ulianza angalau karne ya 17, na mnamo 1861 kilabu cha kwanza cha burudani cha utelezaji kwenye barafu kilifunguliwa na watu wa Norwegi huko Australia.

sentence_eng_Latn: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kuteleza kwa kubeba shanta: Shughuli hii pia huitwa kuteleza mashambani, kutalii kwa kuteleza au matembezi ya kuteleza.

sentence_eng_Latn: It is related to but usually not involving alpine style ski touring or mountaineering, the latter ones done in steep terrain and requiring much stiffer skis and boots.
sentence_swh_Latn: Inahusiana na lakini kawaida haishirikiani na ziara za utelezaji kwenye theluji ya milima mirefu au upandaji wa milima, hilo la mwisho hufanywa katika eneo lenye mteremko na linahitaji bao na buti ngumu.

sentence_eng_Latn: Think of the skiing route as of a similar hiking route.
sentence_swh_Latn: Fikiria kuhusu njia ya utelezaji kwa theluji kama njia mfanano ya kukwea.

sentence_eng_Latn: In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking – but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.
sentence_swh_Latn: Katika hali nzuri utaweza kufikia umbali mkubwa kiasi kuliko kutembea – lakini ni mara chache sana utapata kasi za kuteleza sehemu za mashambani bila shanta nzito katika njia zilizopitiwa awali.

sentence_eng_Latn: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times.
sentence_swh_Latn: Uropa ni bara ambalo ni dogo kiasi lakini lina nchi nyingi huru. Katika hali ya kawaida, kusafiri kupitia nchi nyingi kungemaanisha kulazimika kufanya maombi ya visa na udhibiti wa pasipoti mara nyingi.

sentence_eng_Latn: The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect.
sentence_swh_Latn: Eneo la Schengen, hata hivyo, hufanya kazi kiasi kama nchi moja kuhusiana na jambo hili.

sentence_eng_Latn: As long as you stay in this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints again.
sentence_swh_Latn: Bora ubakie katika eneo hili, unaweza kuvuka mipaka bila kupitia maeneo ya ukaguzi wa pasipoti tena.

sentence_eng_Latn: Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.
sentence_swh_Latn: Vilevile, kwa kuwa na visa ya Schengen, huhitaji kutoa maombi ya visa kwa kila nchi iliyo memba wa Schengen kivyake, hivyo kuokoa muda, pesa na nyaraka.

sentence_eng_Latn: There is no universal definition for which manufactured items are antiques. Some tax agencies define goods older than 100 years as antiques.
sentence_swh_Latn: Hakuna ufafanuzi wa kijumla kuhusu ni bidhaa zipi za viwandani ni za kale. Baadhi ya mashirika ya ushuru hufafanua bidhaa zenye zaidi ya miaka 100 kuwa za kale.

sentence_eng_Latn: The definition has geographic variations, where the age limit might be shorter in places such as North America than in Europe.
sentence_swh_Latn: Ufafanuzi una tofauti za kijiografia, ambapo kikomo cha umri kinaweza kuwa kifupi katika maeneo kama Marekani ya Kaskazini kuliko Ulaya.

sentence_eng_Latn: Handicraft products might be defined as antiques, though they are younger than similar mass-produced goods.
sentence_swh_Latn: Bidhaa za sanaa zinaweza kufafanuliwa kama bidhaa za kale, ingawa ni changa kuliko bidhaa sawa zinazotengenezwa kwa wingi.

sentence_eng_Latn: Reindeer husbandry is an important livelihood among the Sámi and the culture surrounding the trade is important also for many with other professions.
sentence_swh_Latn: Ukulima wa kulungu aktiki ni riziki muhimu miongoni mwa watu wa Sámi na utamaduni unaozunguka biashara hiyo ni muhimu pia kwa wengi walio na taaluma nyingine.

sentence_eng_Latn: Even traditionally, though, not all Sámi have been involved in big scale reindeer husbandry, but lived from fishing, hunting and similar, having reindeer mostly as draft animals.
sentence_swh_Latn: Hata hivyo tangu jadi, sio Sami wote wamekuwa wakijihusisha na ufugaji mkubwa wa kulungu aktiki, lakini waliishi kutoka kwa uvuvi, uwindaji na nyingine kama hizo, na kufuga kulungu aktiki sana sana kama wanyama wa kufanya kazi.

sentence_eng_Latn: Today many Sámi work in modern trades. Tourism is an important income in Sápmi, the Sámi area.
sentence_swh_Latn: Leo Wasámi wengi hufanya kazi katika biashara za kisasa. Utalii ni wa mapato muhimu katika Sápmi, eneo la Sámi.

sentence_eng_Latn: Though it is widely used, especially among non-Romani, the word "Gypsy" is often considered offensive because of its associations with negative stereotypes and inaccurate perceptions of Romani people.
sentence_swh_Latn: Ingawa inatumika sana, na hususana miongoni mwa watu wasio Waromani, neno "Jipsi" mara nyingi huchukuliwa kama la kukera kwa sababu linahusishwa na ubaguzi hasi na mitazamo isiyo sahihi ya watu wa Romani.

sentence_eng_Latn: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kama nchi utakayozuru itakua ni somo kwa ushauri wa kusafiri, bima ya afya yako au bima ya kufuta usafiri wako huenda ikaathirika.

sentence_eng_Latn: You may also wish to consult the advice of governments other than your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens.
sentence_swh_Latn: Pia pengine ungetaka kushauriana na ushauri wa serikali bali na yako, lakini ushauri wao umeundiwa raia wao.

sentence_eng_Latn: As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kama mfano mmoja, raia wa Marekani katika Mashariki ya Kati huenda wakakumbwa na hali tofauti kutoka kwa Wazungu na Waarabu.

sentence_eng_Latn: Advisories are merely a brief summary of the political situation in one country.
sentence_swh_Latn: Ushauri ni muhtasari mfupi tu wa hali ya kisiasa katika nchi moja.

sentence_eng_Latn: The views presented are often cursory, general and oversimplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.
sentence_swh_Latn: Maoni yanayowasilishwa mara nyingi huwa ni ya haraka, ya kijumla na yaliyosahilishwa sana yakilinganishwa na habari za kina zinazopatikana kwingineko.

sentence_eng_Latn: Severe weather is the generic term for any dangerous weather phenomenon with the potential to cause damage, serious social disruption, or loss of human life.
sentence_swh_Latn: Hali kali ya hewa ni neno la kawaida kwa hali yoyote hatari ya hali ya hewa na ina uwezo wa kusababisha uharibifu, usumbufu mkubwa wa kijamii, au kupotea kwa maisha ya mwanadamu.

sentence_eng_Latn: Severe weather can occur anywhere in the world, and there are different types of it, which can depend on geography, topography, and atmospheric conditions.
sentence_swh_Latn: Hali kali ya hewa inawezakuwa popote duniani, na kuna aina nyingi ambazo zinaweza kutegemea jiografia, sura ya nchi, na hali ya anga.

sentence_eng_Latn: High winds, hail, excessive precipitation, and wildfires are forms and effects of severe weather, as are thunderstorms, tornadoes, waterspouts, and cyclones.
sentence_swh_Latn: Upepo mkubwa,mvua ya mawe, ukaukaji, na mioto ya msitu ni maumbo na athari za hali kali za hewa, vilevile dhoruba, , tufani, mifereji ya maji na vimbunga.

sentence_eng_Latn: Regional and seasonal severe weather phenomena include blizzards, snowstorms, ice storms, and dust storms.
sentence_swh_Latn: Matukio ya hali kali ya hewa ya kieneo na kimsimu yanatia ndani dhoruba kali za theluji, dhoruba za theluji, dhoruba za barafu, na dhoruba za vumbi.

sentence_eng_Latn: Travellers are strongly advised to be aware of any risk of severe weather affecting their area as they may affect any travel plans.
sentence_swh_Latn: Wasafiri wanashauriwa kwa dhati kujua kuhusu hatari yoyote ya anga mbaya inayoathiri eneo lao kwani huenda ikaathiri mipango yoyote ya usafiri.

sentence_eng_Latn: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mtu yeyote anayepanga kutembelea nchi ambayo inazingatiwa kuwa eneo la vita anapaswa kupata mafunzo ya kitaalamu.

sentence_eng_Latn: A search of the Internet for 'Hostile environment course' will probably provide the address of a local company.
sentence_swh_Latn: Utafutaji wa ‘Kozi ya mazingira yenye uhasama’ kwenye Intaneti huenda pengine ukatoa anwani ya kampuni ya kienyeji.

sentence_eng_Latn: A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kwa kawaida kozi itashughulikia masuala yote yaliyojadiliwa hapa kwa kina, na aghalabu pamoja na uzoefu wa moja kwa moja.

sentence_eng_Latn: A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kwa kawaida kozi itachukua siku 2-5 na itahusisha uigizaji, huduma nyingi za kwanza na wakati mwingine mafunzo ya kutumia silaha.

sentence_eng_Latn: Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.
sentence_swh_Latn: Vitabu na majarida yanayozungumzia maisha ya nyikani ni ya kawaida, lakini machapisho yanayohusiana na maeneo ya vita ni machache.

sentence_eng_Latn: Voyagers planning sex reassignment surgery abroad must ensure they're carrying valid documents for the return trip.
sentence_swh_Latn: Wasafiri wanaonuia kwenda ng'ambo kwa upasuaji wa kijinsia lazima wahakikishe kuwa wamebeba stakabadhi halali kwa sababu ya safari ya kurudi.

sentence_eng_Latn: The willingness of governments to issue passports with gender not stated (X) or documents updated to match a desired name and gender varies.
sentence_swh_Latn: Utayari wa serikali kutoa pasipoti zisizotaja jinsia (X) au hati zilizosasishwa ili kulingana na jina na jinsia inayonuiwa unatofautiana.

sentence_eng_Latn: Willingness of foreign governments to honour these documents is just as widely variable.
sentence_swh_Latn: Utayari wa serikali za kigeni kukubali nyaraka hizi unatofautiana vilevile.

sentence_eng_Latn: Searches at security checkpoints have also become far more intrusive in the post-September 11, 2001 era.
sentence_swh_Latn: Utafutaji katika vituo vya ukaguzi wa kiusalama pia umekuwa wenye uingiliaji zaidi katika enzi za baada ya Septemba 11, 2001.

sentence_eng_Latn: Pre-operative transgender people should not expect to pass through the scanners with their privacy and dignity intact.
sentence_swh_Latn: Wasenge hawafai kutarajia kupitia kwenye kiwambo cha uchunguzi na watoke huko ikiwa utu na siri zao ziko kamilifu.

sentence_eng_Latn: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mikondo ya mawimbi ya maji ni yale yanayorudi kutokwa kwa mawimbi yanayoachana ufukoni, aghalabu mwambani au mahali sawa.

sentence_eng_Latn: Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kwa sababu ya topolojia ya chini ya maji, yale yanayorudi huwa yamelimbikizia katika maeneo machache ya kina, na mawimbi ya kasi kwa maji ya kina yanaweza kuundika hapo.

sentence_eng_Latn: Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible.
sentence_swh_Latn: Vifo vingi hutokea kutokana na machovu ya kujaribu kuogelea kinyume na mawimbi, hali ambayo huenda ikawa ngumu.

sentence_eng_Latn: As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mara tu utakapotoka kwenye mkondo, kuogelea kurudi si kugumu zaidi ya kawaida.

sentence_eng_Latn: Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue.
sentence_swh_Latn: Jaribu kulenga mahali ambapo hutashikwa tena au, kulingana na ujuzi wako au kama umeonekana, huenda ukataka kungoja uokovu.

sentence_eng_Latn: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mshtuko wa kurudi tena huja upesi kuliko mshtuko wa tamaduni (kuna kipindi chini ya fungate), hukaa kwa muda mrefu, na huweza kuwa kali zaidi.

sentence_eng_Latn: Travellers who had an easy time adjusting to the new culture sometimes have a particularly hard time readjusting to their native culture.
sentence_swh_Latn: Wasafiri ambao walikuwa na wakati rahisi kuzoea utamaduni mpya wakati mwingine wana wakati mgumu wa kurekebisha upya utamaduni wao wa asili.

sentence_eng_Latn: When returning home after living abroad, you've adapted to the new culture and lost some of your habits from your home culture.
sentence_swh_Latn: Wakati wa kurudi nyumbani baada ya kuishi ughaibuni, umezoea utamaduni mpya na kupoteza baadhi ya tabia zako kutoka kwa utamaduni wako wa nyumbani.

sentence_eng_Latn: When you went abroad at first, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travellers in a new country need to adapt.
sentence_swh_Latn: Wakati ulienda ng’ambo kwa mara ya kwanza, watu walikuwa pengine na subira na kuelewa, wakijua wasafiri katika nchi ya kigeni, wanahitaji kuzoea.

sentence_eng_Latn: People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home.
sentence_swh_Latn: Huenda watu wasitarajie kwamba uvumilivu na ufahamu pia ni muhimu kwa wasafiri wanaorudi nyumbani.

sentence_eng_Latn: The pyramid sound and light show is one of the most interesting things in the area for kids.
sentence_swh_Latn: Sauti ya piramidi na onyesho la nuru ni mojawapo ya mambo yanayofurahisha zaidi katika eneo la watoto.

sentence_eng_Latn: You can see the pyramids in the dark and you can see them in silence before the show begins.
sentence_swh_Latn: Unaweza kuona piramidi gizani na unaweza kuziona katika utulivu kabla ya maonyesho kuanza.

sentence_eng_Latn: Usually you always here the sound of tourists and vendors. The story of the sound and light is just like a story book.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kwa kawaida huwa unasikia sauti ya watalii na wauzaji. Hadithi ya sauti na mwanga ni kama kitabu cha hadithi.

sentence_eng_Latn: The Sphinx is set as the backdrop and the narrator of a long story.
sentence_swh_Latn: Sphinx amewekwa kama usuli na msimulizi wa hadithi ndefu.

sentence_eng_Latn: The scenes are displayed on the pyramids and the different pyramids are lit up.
sentence_swh_Latn: Matuko yanaonyeshwa kwenye piramidi na piramidi tofauti huangaza.

sentence_eng_Latn: South Shetland Islands, discovered in 1819, are claimed by several nations and have the most bases, with sixteen active in 2020.
sentence_swh_Latn: Visiwa vya kusini mwa Shetlandi, vilivyogunduliwa mnamo 1819, vinadaiwa kuwa milki ya mataifa kadhaa na vina misingi mingi, ikiwemo kumi na sita iliyo hai mnamo 2020.

sentence_eng_Latn: The archipelago lies 120 km north of the Peninsula. The largest is King George Island with the settlement of Villa Las Estrellas.
sentence_swh_Latn: Visiwa vimo kilomita 120 kaskazini mwa Rasi. Kubwa zaidi ni Kisiwa cha King George kilicho na makazi ya Villa Las Estrellas.

sentence_eng_Latn: Others include Livingston Island, and Deception where the flooded caldera of a still-active volcano provides a spectacular natural harbour.
sentence_swh_Latn: Vingine ni pamoja na Kisiwa cha Livingston, na Udanganyifu, ambapo kaldera iliyofurika ya volkano hai hutoa bandari asili ya kipekee.

sentence_eng_Latn: Ellsworth Land is the region south of the Peninsula, bounded by the Bellingshausen Sea.
sentence_swh_Latn: Ellsworth Land ni mkoa kusini mwa Peninsula, unaopakana na Bahari la Bellingshausen.

sentence_eng_Latn: The mountains of the Peninsula here merge into the plateau, then re-emerge to form the 360 km chain of the Ellsworth Mountains, bisected by the Minnesota Glacier.
sentence_swh_Latn: Milima ya Peninsula hapa inajiunga na huu uwanda, kisha ikaibuka tena kuunda safu ya kilomita 360 ya Milima ya Ellsworth, na kugawanywa na Tungamo za barafu za Minnesota.

sentence_eng_Latn: The northern part or Sentinel Range has Antarctica's highest mountains, the Vinson Massif, peaking at 4892 m Mount Vinson.
sentence_swh_Latn: Sehemu ya kaskazini au msafa wa Sentinel una milima mirefu zaidi ya Antaktika kama vile Vinson Massif, iliyofikia urefu wa 4892 na Mlima Vinson.

sentence_eng_Latn: In remote locations, without cell phone coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option.
sentence_swh_Latn: Katika sehemu za mbali, bila signali za simu za mkononi, simu ya setilaiti huenda ikawa chaguo lako la pekee.

sentence_eng_Latn: A satellite phone is not generally a replacement for a mobile phone, as you have to be outdoors with clear line of sight to the satellite to make a phone call.
sentence_swh_Latn: Simu ya satelaiti sio kwa ujumla mbadala wa simu ya rununu, kwani lazima uwe nje wazi na kuona laini za satelaiti ili kupiga simu.

sentence_eng_Latn: The service is frequently used by shipping, including pleasure craft, as well as expeditions who have remote data and voice needs.
sentence_swh_Latn: Huduma hutumika mara kwa mara na usafirishaji, vikiwemo vyombo vya anasa, vilevile safari zilizo na mahitaji ya data na sauti ya mbali.

sentence_eng_Latn: Your local telephone service provider should be able to give more information about connecting to this service.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mtoaji wako wa huduma za simu anastahili aweze kutoa habari zaidi kuhusu kuunganishwa na huduma hii.

sentence_eng_Latn: An increasingly more popular option for those planning a gap-year is to travel and learn.
sentence_swh_Latn: Uchaguzi unaozidi kuwa maarufu kwa wale wanaopanga pengo la mwaka mmoja ni kusafiri na kujifunza.

sentence_eng_Latn: This is especially popular with school leavers, allowing them to take a year out before university, without compromising their education.
sentence_swh_Latn: Hii haswa ni maarufu kwa waliohitimu shuleni, ikiwaruhusu kukaa nje kwa mwaka mmoja kabla ya kuingia chuo kikuu, bila kuathiri masomo yao.

sentence_eng_Latn: In many cases, enrolling on a gap-year course abroad can actually improve your chances of moving into higher education back in your home country.
sentence_swh_Latn: Katika hali nyingi, kujisajilisha kwa kozi mwaka-pengo ughaibuni kwa hakika kunaweza kuboresha nafasi zako za kuendeleza elimu ya juu katika nchi yako.

sentence_eng_Latn: Typically there will be a tuition fee to enroll in these educational programs.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kwa kawaida kutakuwa na ada ya mafunzo ili kujisajili katika mipango hii ya kielimu.

sentence_eng_Latn: Finland is a great boating destination. The "Land of a thousand lakes" has thousands of islands too, in the lakes and in the coastal archipelagos.
sentence_swh_Latn: Ufini ni mahali pazuri pa uendeshaji mashua. “Nchi ya maziwa elfu” ina maelfu ya visiwa pia, katika maziwa na katika visiwa vya pwani.

sentence_eng_Latn: In the archipelagos and lakes you do not necessarily need a yacht.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kwa funguvisiwa na visiwa sio lazima uhitaji meli.

sentence_eng_Latn: Although the coastal archipelagos and the biggest lakes are indeed big enough for any yacht, smaller boats or even a kayak offer a different experience.
sentence_swh_Latn: Ingawa visiwa vya pwani na maziwa makubwa zaidi kwa kweli ni makubwa kutosha kwa mashua yoyote, boti ndogo ama hata kayaki hutoa uzoefu tofauti.

sentence_eng_Latn: Boating is a national pastime in Finland, with a boat to every seven or eight people.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kuendesha mashua ni mchezo wa kimataifa nchini Finland, na mashua kwa kila watu saba au nane.

sentence_eng_Latn: This is matched by Norway, Sweden and New Zealand, but otherwise quite unique (e.g. in the Netherlands the figure is one to forty).
sentence_swh_Latn: Hii inaendana na Norway, Sweden na Nyuzilandi, lakini vinginevyo ni tofauti kabisa (kwa mfano katika Uholanzi takwimu ni moja kwa arobaini).

sentence_eng_Latn: Most of the distinct Baltic Cruises feature an extended stay in St. Petersburg, Russia.
sentence_swh_Latn: Nyingi ya safari za Baltic huwa na kukaa kwa muda mrefu katika St. Petersburg, Urusi.

sentence_eng_Latn: This means you can visit the historic city for a couple of full days while returning and sleeping on the ship at night.
sentence_swh_Latn: Hii ina maana kuwa unaweza kulitembelea jiji la kihistoria kwa kutwa kadhaa huku ukirudi na kulala kwenye meli wakati wa usiku.

sentence_eng_Latn: If you only go ashore using shipboard excursions you will not need a separate visa (as of 2009).
sentence_swh_Latn: Ikiwa huwa unaenda ufukweni tu ukitumia safari za meli hutahitaji visa tofauti (kufikia mwaka wa 2009).

sentence_eng_Latn: Some cruises feature Berlin, Germany in the brochures. As you can see from the map above Berlin is no where near the sea and a visit to the city is not included in the price of the cruise.
sentence_swh_Latn: Baadhi ya safari za baharini huonyesha Berlin na Ujerumani katika brosha zao. Kama unavyoona katika ramani iliyo hapo juu, Berlin haipo popote karibu na bahari na safari ya jiji hili haijumuishwi katika bei ya safari za baharini.

sentence_eng_Latn: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kusafiri kwa ndege kunaweza kuwa uzoefu wa kuogofya kwa watu wa umri na malezi yote, hasa kama hawajasafiri kwa ndege tena au walipatwa na tukio la kufadhaisha.

sentence_eng_Latn: It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have.
sentence_swh_Latn: Si jambo la kuaibikia: si tofauti sana na hofu ya kibinafsi na isiyopenda vitu vingine ambayo watu wengi wako nayo.

sentence_eng_Latn: For some, understanding something about how aircraft work and what happens during a flight may help to overcome a fear which is based on the unknown or on not being in control.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kwa wengine, kuelewa jinsi ndege inavyofanya kazi na kinachotokea wakati wa ndege kuruka inaweza kusaidia kushinda hofu ambayo msingi wake ni mambo yasiyojulikana ama kutokuwa kwenye udhibiti.

sentence_eng_Latn: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kampuni za uchukuzi hulipwa vizuri kwa kufikisha vitu haraka. Mara kwa mara, muda ni muhimu sana kwa hati za kibiashara, bidhaa, au vipuli kwa ukarabati wa haraka.

sentence_eng_Latn: On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem.
sentence_swh_Latn: Katika baadhi ya njia, kampuni kubwa zina ndege zao wenyewe, lakini kwa njia nyingine na kampuni ndogo kulikuwa na shida.

sentence_eng_Latn: If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kama wangetuma vitu kwa mizigo ya ndege, katika baadhi ya njia huenda ingechukua siku kadhaa kukamilisha upakuaji na forodha.

sentence_eng_Latn: The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.
sentence_swh_Latn: Njia pekee ya kuipitisha kwa haraka ilikuwa kuituma kama mzigo uliokaguliwa. Kanuni za kampuni za ndege hazitazikubalia kutuma mzigo bila abiria, ambapo ndipo unaingilia.

sentence_eng_Latn: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you).
sentence_swh_Latn: Njia dhahiri ya kusafiri katika daraja la kwanza au kibiashara ni kutoa pesa nyingi kwa fursa hiyo (au, bora zaidi, kufanya kampuni yako ikulipie).

sentence_eng_Latn: However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class!
sentence_swh_Latn: Walakini, hii haikuji kwa bei rahisi: kwa sababu ya sheria mbaya zisizobainika, unaweza kutarajia kulipa hadi mara nne ya kawaida ya uchumi, nauli ya biashara, na mara 11 kwa cheo cha kwanza!

sentence_eng_Latn: Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kuongea kwa jumla, hakuna haja ya hata kutafuta vipunguzo kwa biashara au viti vya daraja la kwanza katika safari za ndege za moja kwa moja toka A hadi B.

sentence_eng_Latn: Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting somewhere fast and in comfort, and charge accordingly.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kampuni za ndege zinajua vizuri kwamba kuna kundi fulani la ndani la wasafiri ambao wako tayari kulipa pesa nyingi kwa haki ya kufika mahali kwa haraka na kwa starehe, na wanabadilisha ipasavyo.

sentence_eng_Latn: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mji mkuu wa Moldova ni Chisinau. Lugha ya ndani ni Kiroma, lakini Kirusi inatumika sana.

sentence_eng_Latn: Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict.
sentence_swh_Latn: Moldova ni taifa lenye makabila mngi ambayo yameteseka kutokana na migogoro ya kikabila.

sentence_eng_Latn: In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mnamo 1994, migogoro hii ilipelekea kuundwa na kujitangaza kwa Taifa la Transnistria mashariki mwa Moldova, ambalo lina serikali na sarafu yake, lakini halitambuliwa na taifa lolote wanachama wa Umoja wa Mataifa.

sentence_eng_Latn: Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations.
sentence_swh_Latn: Viungo vya kiuchumi vimeanzishwa tena kati ya sehemu hizi mbili za Moldova licha ya kutofaulu kwa majadiliano ya kisiasa.

sentence_eng_Latn: The major religion in Moldova is Orthodox Christian.
sentence_swh_Latn: Dini kuu katika Moldova ni Ukristo wa Kiorthodoksi.

sentence_eng_Latn: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of around 3.7 million, the second biggest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport hub.
sentence_swh_Latn: Izmir ni mji wa tatu kwa ukubwa nchini Uturuki na idadi ya watu ya takribani milioni 3.7, bandari ya pili kwa ukubwa baada ya Istanbul, na kitovu kizuri sana cha uchukuzi.

sentence_eng_Latn: Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains.
sentence_swh_Latn: Uliokuwa mji wa kale wa Smyma, sasa ni wa kisasa, ulioendelea, na wa kibiashara wenye shughuli nyingi, ulioewekwa kuzunguka kituo kikubwa na umezungukwa na milima.

sentence_eng_Latn: The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.
sentence_swh_Latn: Njia pana, majengo yenye vioo sehemu za mbele na vituo vya kisasa vya kibiashara vimejaa paa za vigae vyekundu vya jadi, soko la karne ya 18, misikiti na makanisa ya zamani, ingawa jiji lenyewe lina anga ya Uropa kuliko Uturuki ya jadi.

sentence_eng_Latn: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kijiji cha Haldarsvik kina mtazamo wa kisiwa kilicho karibu cha Eysturoi na kina kanisa lenye umbo lisilo la kawaida la pembe nane.

sentence_eng_Latn: In the churchyard, there are interesting marble sculptures of doves over some tombs.
sentence_swh_Latn: Katika uwanja wa kanisa, kuna vinyago vya kuvutia vya marumaru vya njiwa juu ya kaburi.

sentence_eng_Latn: It's worth half an hour to stroll about the intriguing village.
sentence_swh_Latn: Inafaa nusu saa kutembeatembea katika kijiji hicho ambacho kinavutia.

sentence_eng_Latn: To the north and within easy reach is the romantic and fascinating town of Sintra and which was made famous to foreigners after a glowing account of its splendours recorded by Lord Byron.
sentence_swh_Latn: Upande wa kaskazini na mahali rahisi kufika kuna mji wa mahaba na wa kuvutia, uliofanywa maarufu na wageni baada ya kusimulia mapambo yake ya kung'aa kama yalivyorekodiwa na Lord Byron.

sentence_eng_Latn: Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca.
sentence_swh_Latn: Basi la Skotabu 403 husafiri mara kwa mara hadi Sintra, na kusimama Kabo da Roka.

sentence_eng_Latn: Also to the north visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions.
sentence_swh_Latn: Pia upande wa kaskazini tembelea Hekalu la Mama Yetu Fatima (Madhabahu), mahali maarufu duniani pa maonyesho ya Maria.

sentence_eng_Latn: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population.
sentence_swh_Latn: Tafadhali kumbuka kuwa hasa unatembelea mahali penye kaburi la watu wengi, na pia mahali ambapo pana maana isiyoweza kutabiriwa kwa sehemu kubwa ya idadi ya watu ulimwenguni.

sentence_eng_Latn: There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kungali kuna wanaume na wanawake wengi walio hai walioishi muda wao hapa, na wengine wengi ambao wapendwa wao waliuawa au walifanyishwa kazi hadi kufa, Wayahudi na wasio Wayahudi vilevile.

sentence_eng_Latn: Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis.
sentence_swh_Latn: Tafadhali tendea mahali hapo kwa hadhi yote, utaratibu na heshima inayostahiki. Usifanye utani juu ya Maangamizo au Wanazi.

sentence_eng_Latn: Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.
sentence_swh_Latn: Usiumbue tovuti kwa kuashiria au kukata michoro kwenye miundo.

sentence_eng_Latn: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish.
sentence_swh_Latn: Lugha rasmi za Baselona Kikatalani na Kihispania. Takribani nusu yao wanapendelea kuongea Kikatalani, idadi kubwa wanaielewa, na karibu kila mtu anajua Kihispania.

sentence_eng_Latn: However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language.
sentence_swh_Latn: Hata hivyo, ishara nyingi huonyeshwa kwa Kikatalani kwa sababu imewekwa kisheria kama lugha rasmi ya kwanza.

sentence_eng_Latn: Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kihispania bado hutumika sana katika uchukuzi wa umma na maeneo mengine.

sentence_eng_Latn: Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.
sentence_swh_Latn: Matangazo ya mara kwa mara katika Metro hufanywa tu kwa Kitalani, lakini usumbufu usiopangwa hutangazwa kwa mifumo otomatiki kwa kutumia lugha mbalimbali zikiwemo Kihispania, Kiingereza, Kifaransa, Kiarabu na Kijapanisi.

sentence_eng_Latn: Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant.
sentence_swh_Latn: Waparisi wana sifa ya kujipenda, jeuri na wenye kiburi.

sentence_eng_Latn: While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is "bien élevé" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier.
sentence_swh_Latn: Wakati hii mara nyingi ni aina ya dhana tu isiyofaa, njia nzuri ya kupatana kule Paris bado ni kuwa katika tabia yako njema, kufanya kama mtu ambaye ni “bien e’lev’e” (amelelewa vizuri). Itafanya kupatana rahisi mno.

sentence_eng_Latn: Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies.
sentence_swh_Latn: Umbo za nje za ghafla za Parisiani zitayeyuka haraka ikiwa unaonyesha ustahifu kadhaa za kimsingi.

sentence_eng_Latn: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mbuga ya Kitaifa ya Plitvice Lakes ina misitu sana, hususan mifune, misonobari, na miti ya misonobari, na mchanganyiko wa uoto wa safu ya milima ya Alp na mediterania.

sentence_eng_Latn: It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude.
sentence_swh_Latn: Ina aina anuwai za jamii za mimea, kutokana na masafa yake ya hali ndogondogo za anga, mchanga tofauti na kutofautiana kwa viwango vya urefu.

sentence_eng_Latn: The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species.
sentence_swh_Latn: Eneo hilo pia ni nyumbani mwa aina nyingi sana mbalimbali za spishi za wanyama na ndege.

sentence_eng_Latn: Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species
sentence_swh_Latn: Wanyama nadra kama vile Dubu wa hudhurungi wa Ulaya, mbwa mwitu, tai, bundi, simba-mangu, paka mwitu na kware wa Ulaya wanaweza kupatikana huko, pamoja na spishi nyingine nyingi za kawaida.

sentence_eng_Latn: While visiting the monasteries, women are required to wear skirts covering the knees and have their shoulders covered, too.
sentence_swh_Latn: Wakati wa kutembelea nyumba za watawa, wanawake wanatarajiwa kuvaa sketi zinazofunika magoti na pia wafunike mabega yao.

sentence_eng_Latn: Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance.
sentence_swh_Latn: Nyingi za monasteri hutoa kanga kwa wanawake wanaokuja bila, lakini ukija na kanga yako, haswa iliyo na rangi kali, utapata tabasamu kutoka kwa monaki au sista kwenye kiingilio.

sentence_eng_Latn: Along the same line, men are required to wear trousers covering the knees.
sentence_swh_Latn: Vile vile, wanaume wanahitajika kuvaa suruali zinazofunika magoti.

sentence_eng_Latn: This too can be borrowed from the stock at the entrance but that clothing isn't washed after every user so you may not feel comfortable wearing these skirts. One size fits all for men!
sentence_swh_Latn: Hii pia inaweza kuombwa kutoka kwa akiba kwenye lango lakini nguo hizo hazifuliwi baada ya kila mtumiaji kwa hivyo huenda usijihisi mwenye starehe unapovaa sketi hizo. Saizi moja hutosha wote kwa wanaume!

sentence_eng_Latn: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar zones in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (specially pork), and uses olive oil throughout.
sentence_swh_Latn: Vyakula vya Majokan, kama vile vya sehemu nyingine kwenye kanda ya bahari ya Mediterranean, vimetengenezwa kwa mkate, mboga na nyama (hasa ya nguruwe), na hutumia mafuta ya mizeituni nyakati zote.

sentence_eng_Latn: A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any available condiments such as cheese, tunafish, etc.
sentence_swh_Latn: Chakula rahisi cha jioni, hasa wakati wa kiangazi, huwa ni Pa ambi Oli: Mkate wa mafuta ya mizeituni, nyanya, na viungo vingine vinavyopatikana kama vile jibini na samakituna.

sentence_eng_Latn: All nouns, alongside the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence.
sentence_swh_Latn: Nomino zote, ikiwemo Sie kwa wewe, daima huanza kwa herufi kubwa, hata katika katikati mwa sentensi.

sentence_eng_Latn: This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and objects.
sentence_swh_Latn: Hii ni njia muhimu ya kutofautisha kati ya baadhi ya vitenzi na vitu.

sentence_eng_Latn: It also arguably makes reading easier, though writing is somewhat complicated by the need to find out whether a verb or adjective is used in a substantivized form.
sentence_swh_Latn: Pia bila shaka inafanya kusoma rahisi, ingawa kuandika kwa kiasi fulani ni ngumu kwa haja ya kutaka kujua kama kitenzi au kivumishi kinatumika kwa umuhimu.

sentence_eng_Latn: Pronunciation is relatively easy in Italian since most words are pronounced exactly how they are written
sentence_swh_Latn: Matamshi ni rahisi kiasi kwa Kiitaliano kwani maneno mengi hutamkwa hasa yalivyoandikwa

sentence_eng_Latn: The main letters to watch out for are c and g, since their pronunciation varies based on the following vowel.
sentence_swh_Latn: Herufi muhimu za kuzingatia ni c na g, kwani matamshi yake hubadilika kulingana na vokali inayofuata.

sentence_eng_Latn: Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, whereas carro means chariot.
sentence_swh_Latn: Pia, hakikisha kutamka r na rr tofauti: caro inamaanisha mpenzi, ilhali carro inamaanisha gari la kuvurutwa na farasi.

sentence_eng_Latn: Persian has a relatively easy and mostly regular grammar.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kiajemi ina sarufi rahisi kiasi, na mara nyingi ya kawaida.

sentence_eng_Latn: Therefore, reading this grammar primer would help you learn much about Persian grammar and understand phrases better.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kwa hivyo, kusoma chanzo hiki cha sarufi kutakusaidia wewe kujifunza mengi kuhusu sarufi ya Kiajemi na kuelewa bora zaidi.

sentence_eng_Latn: Needless to say, if you know a Romance language, it will be easier for you to learn Portuguese.
sentence_swh_Latn: Bila haja ya kusema, ikiwa unaifahamu lugha ya mahaba, itakuwa rahisi kwako kujifunza Kireno.

sentence_eng_Latn: However, people who know a little Spanish may hastily conclude that Portuguese is close enough that it need not be studied separately.
sentence_swh_Latn: Hata hivyo, watu wanaofahamu Kihispania kidogo wanaweza kuhitimisha kwa haraka kuwa Kireno kinakaribiana sana na kwamba hakihitaji kusomwa kando.

sentence_eng_Latn: Pre-modern observatories are usually obsolete today, and remain as museums, or sites of education.
sentence_swh_Latn: Uchunguzi kabla ya kisasa kwa kawaida hautumiki leo, na hubaki kama makavazi, ama sehemu za elimu.

sentence_eng_Latn: As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kwani uchafuzi wa mwanga nyakati zao haukuwa shida kama ilivyo leo, mara nyingi wako mijini au katikavyuo vikuu, rahisi kufikia kuliko zile zimejengwa siku za kisasa.

sentence_eng_Latn: Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.
sentence_swh_Latn: Darubini nyingi za utafiti za kisasa ni vifaa kuu katika maeneo ya mbali yaliyo na hali nzuri za angahewa.

sentence_eng_Latn: Cherry blossom viewing, known as hanami, has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century.
sentence_swh_Latn: Utazamaji wa maua ya cheri, inayojulikana kama hanami, imekuwa sehemu ya utamaduni wa Kijapani tangu karne ya 8.

sentence_eng_Latn: The concept came from China where plum blossoms were the flower of choice.
sentence_swh_Latn: Dhana hiyo ilitoka Uchina ambapo maua ya plamu ndiyo yaliyokuwa maua yaliyopendelewa.

sentence_eng_Latn: In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.
sentence_swh_Latn: Huko Japani, sherehe za kwanza za maua ya mcheri ziliandaliwa na maliki kwa ajili yake mwenyewe na washiriki wengine wa upatanishi waliozunguka Mahakama ya Imperi.

sentence_eng_Latn: Plants look their best when in a natural environment, so resist the temptation to remove even "just one" specimen.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mimea inaonekana bora ikiwa katika mazingira ya asili, kwa hivyo epuka kishawishi cha kutoa hata kiolezo "kimoja tu".

sentence_eng_Latn: If visiting a formally arranged garden, collecting "specimens" is also going to get you ejected, without discussion.
sentence_swh_Latn: Ikiwa unatembelea bustani iliyopangwa rasmi, kukusanya “violezo” pia kutakufanya uodolewe, bila majadiliano.

sentence_eng_Latn: Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving.
sentence_swh_Latn: Singapori kwa ujumla ni mahali salama zaidi kuwa na rahisi sana kuabiri, na unaweza kununua karibu chochote baada ya kuwasili.

sentence_eng_Latn: But being placed in the "high tropics" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely).
