sentence_swh_Latn: Lakini kwa kuwekwa katika “tropiki za juu” digrii chache tu kaskazini mwa istiwai utahitaji kukabiliana na joto jingi (kila wakati) na jua kali (wakati anga ni safi, nadra zaidi).

sentence_eng_Latn: There are also a few buses going north to Hebron, the traditional burial place of the Biblical patriarchs Abraham, Isaac, Jacob, and their wives.
sentence_swh_Latn: Pia kuna mabasi machache yanayoelekea kaskazini mwa Hebroni, mahali pa makaburi ya jadi ya mashujaa wa Biblia Abrahamu, Isaka, Yakobo, na wake zao.

sentence_eng_Latn: Check that the bus you are thinking of taking goes into Hebron and not just to the nearby Jewish settlement of Kiryat Arba.
sentence_swh_Latn: Hakikisha kwamba basi unalofikiria kuabiri linaenda Hebron na si katika makazi ya karibu ya Kiyahudi ya Kiryat Arba tu.

sentence_eng_Latn: Inland waterways can be a good theme to base a holiday around.
sentence_swh_Latn: Njia za maji za barani zinaweza kuwa mandhari mzuri ya kufanyia likizo.

sentence_eng_Latn: For example visiting castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine valley or taking a cruise to interesting cites on the Danube or boating along the Erie Canal.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kwa mfano, kutembelea ngome katika Bonde la Loire, Bonde la Rhine au kusafiri katika maeneo ya kuvutia kwa Danube au kusafiri kwa mashua upande wa Mfereji wa Erie.

sentence_eng_Latn: They also define routes for popular hiking and cycling trails.
sentence_swh_Latn: Pia wao hufafanua njia maarufu za matembezi na uendeshaji baiskeli.

sentence_eng_Latn: Christmas is one of the most important holidays of Christianity, and is celebrated as the birthday of Jesus.
sentence_swh_Latn: Krismasi ni moja ya likizo muhimu zaidi ya Ukristo, na inaadhimishwa kama siku ya kuzaliwa kwa Yesu.

sentence_eng_Latn: Many of the traditions surrounding the holiday have been adopted also by non-believers in Christian countries and non-Christians around the world.
sentence_swh_Latn: Nyingi za tamaduni zinazozunguka likizo zimesilikwa pia na wasioamini katika nchi za Kikristo na wasio Wakristo duniani kote.

sentence_eng_Latn: There's a tradition to pass the Easter night awake at some exposed point to see the sunrise.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kuna desturi ya kukesha usiku wa Pasaka katika sehemu fulani wazi ili kuona jua likichomoza.

sentence_eng_Latn: There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it may well be a pre-Christian Spring and Fertility ritual.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kwa kweli kuna maelezo ya thiolojia ya Kikristo ya utamaduni huu, lakini pia huenda ikawa ibada ya Majira ya kuchipua na Uzazi kabla ya Ukristo.

sentence_eng_Latn: More traditional churches often hold an Easter Vigil on Saturday night during the Easter weekend, with the congregations often breaking into celebration at the stroke of midnight to celebrate Christ's resurrection.
sentence_swh_Latn: Makanisa zaidi ya jadi huwa na Mkesha wa Pasaka usiku wa Jumamosi wakati wa wikendi ya Pasaka, waumini wakisherehekea saa sita kamili za usiku kuadhimisha ufufuo wa Kristo.

sentence_eng_Latn: All animals that originally arrived in the islands came here either by swimming, flying or floating.
sentence_swh_Latn: Wanyama wote asili waliofika katika visiwa hivi walikuja hapa pengine kwa kuogelea, kupaa au kuelea.

sentence_eng_Latn: Due to the long distance from the continent mammals were unable to make the journey making the giant tortoise the primary grazing animal in the Galapagos.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kwa sababu ya masafa marefu kutoka kwa bara, mamalia walishindwa kumalize mwendo, huku mzee kobe jitu akiwa mnyama wa kimsingi mla nyasi katika Galapagosi.

sentence_eng_Latn: Since the arrival of man to the Galapagos, many mammals have been introduced including goats, horses, cows, rats, cats and dogs.
sentence_swh_Latn: Tangu kuwasili kwa mwanadamu katika Galapagos, mamalia wengi wamewasilishwa pamoja na mbuzi, farasi, ng'ombe, panya, paka na mbwa.

sentence_eng_Latn: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic areas in the winter you will experience the polar night, which means that the sun doesn't rise above the horizon.
sentence_swh_Latn: Ukitembelea maeneo ya Aktiki na Antaktiki msimu wa baridi utapata tajriba ya usiku wa pola, ambayo ina maana kuwa jua halichomozi juu ya upeo wa macho.

sentence_eng_Latn: This offers a good opportunity to see the Aurora borealis, as the sky will be dark more or less around the clock.
sentence_swh_Latn: Hii inatoa fursa nzuri ya kuona mwanga wa Aurora, kwani anga itakuwa giza kwa kadiri fulani mchana na usiku.

sentence_eng_Latn: As the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution therefore often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.
sentence_swh_Latn: Kwa kuwa maeneo hayo hayana idadi kubwa ya watu, na uchafuzi kidogo aghalabu huwa si tatizo, pia utaweza kufuruhia nyota.

sentence_eng_Latn: Japanese work culture is more hierarchical and formal that what Westerners may be used to.
sentence_swh_Latn: Desturi ya kazi ya Kijapani ni ya kimfumo na rasmi kuliko mazoea ya Wanamagharibi.

sentence_eng_Latn: Suits are standard business attire, and coworkers call each other by their family names or by job titles.
sentence_swh_Latn: Suti ni mavazi ya kawaida ya kibiashara, na wafanyikazi huita wenzao kwa majina ya familia zao au kwa majina ya kikazi.

sentence_eng_Latn: Workplace harmony is crucial, emphasizing group effort rather than praising individual accomplishments.
sentence_swh_Latn: Ulinganifu katika mahali pa kazi ni muhimu, kusisitiza juhudi za vikundi badala ya kusifu mafanikio ya kibinafsi.

sentence_eng_Latn: Workers must often get their superiors' approval for any decisions they make, and are expected to obey their superiors' instructions without question.
sentence_swh_Latn: Mara kwa mara wafanyakazi hupata kibali cha maamuzi yoyote wanayofanya kutoka kwa wasimamizi wao, na wanatarajiwa kutii maagizo ya wakuu wao bila maswali.
